english: The things here are criminally expensive!

hanzi: 我们 都 急 死了。
pinyin: Wǒmen dōu jí sǐ le!
english: We are all so terribly anxious!

hanzi: 这个 孩子 烦 死了。
pinyin: Zhège háizi fán sǐ le!
english: This kid is so freaking annoying!

hanzi: 哇，可爱 死了 ！
pinyin: Wā, kě'ài sǐ le!
english: OMG, adorbs!

hanzi: 漂亮 死了 ！
pinyin: Piàoliang sǐ le!
english: Drop-dead gorgeous!

hanzi: 这 个 蛋糕 好吃 死了 。
pinyin: Zhège dàngāo hǎochī sǐ le!
english: This cake is to die for!

hanzi: 这 几 个 地方 都 差不多 。
pinyin: Zhè jǐ gè dìfang dōu chàbuduō.
english: These places are all pretty much the same.

hanzi: 这 两 个 词 的 意思 差不多 。
pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè cí de yìsi chàbuduō.
english: The meanings of these two words are pretty much the same.

hanzi: 我们 的 想法 差不多 。
pinyin: Wǒmen de xiǎngfǎ chàbuduō.
english: Our ways of thinking are pretty much the same.

hanzi: 那 两 家 餐厅 的 菜 差不多 。
pinyin: Nà liǎng jiā cāntīng de cài chàbuduō.
english: Those two restaurants' dishes are almost the same.

hanzi: 你们 的 中文 水平 差不多 。
pinyin: Nǐmen de Zhōngwén shuǐpíng chàbuduō.
english: Your Chinese levels are almost the same.

hanzi: 上海 和 纽约 差不多。
pinyin: Shànghǎi hé Niǔyuē chàbuduō.
english: Shanghai and New York are basically the same.

hanzi: Starbucks 和 Costa 差不多。
pinyin: Starbucks hé Costa chàbuduō.
english: Starbucks and Costa are almost the same.

hanzi: 这里 的 天气 跟 台湾 的 天气 差不多。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn Táiwān de tiānqì chàbuduō.
english: The weather here is pretty much like Taiwan's.

hanzi: 你的 工作 跟 我的 工作 差不多。
pinyin: Nǐ de gōngzuò gēn wǒ de gōngzuò chàbuduō.
english: Your job and my job are almost the same.

hanzi: 你的 新 手机 跟 我的 旧 手机 差不多。
pinyin: Nǐ de xīn shǒujī gēn wǒ de jiù shǒujī chàbuduō.
english: Your new cell phone is pretty much like my old cell phone.

hanzi: 这 两 个 孩子 差不多 大。
pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè háizi chàbuduō dà.
english: These two children are more or less the same age.

hanzi: 我 跟 我哥哥 差不多 高。
pinyin: Wǒ gēn wǒ gēge chàbuduō gāo.
english: My older brother and I are more or less the same height.

hanzi: 我 差不多 到 公园 门口 了。
pinyin: Wǒ chàbuduō dào gōngyuán ménkǒu le.
english: I'm almost at the entrance of the park.

hanzi: 电影 差不多 要 开始 了。
pinyin: Diànyǐng chàbuduō yào kāishǐ le.
english: The movie is almost about to start.

hanzi: 今天 的 工作 差不多 做 完 了。
pinyin: Jīntiān de gōngzuò chàbuduō zuò wán le.
english: Today's work is almost done.

hanzi: 你 儿子 差不多 五 岁 了 吧？
pinyin: Nǐ érzi chàbuduō wǔ suì le ba?
english: Your son should be about 5 years old, right?

hanzi: 他 住 在 上海 差不多 三 个 月 了。
pinyin: Tā zhù zài Shànghǎi chàbuduō sān gè yuè le.
english: He has lived in Shanghai for about three months.

hanzi: 我 在 这 家 公司 工作 了 差不多 十 年 了。
pinyin: Wǒ zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò le chàbuduō shí nián le.
english: I've worked for this company for almost ten years.

hanzi: 我 父母 结婚 差不多 二十 年 了。
pinyin: Wǒ fùmǔ jiéhūn chàbuduō èrshí nián le.
english: My parents have been married for about twenty years.

hanzi: 差不多 两 个 星期 以前，我 在 北京 见 过 他。
pinyin: Chàbuduō liǎng gè xīngqī yǐqián, wǒ zài Běijīng jiàn guo tā.
english: About two weeks ago I met with him in Beijing.

hanzi: 很 多 地方 都 有 wifi。
pinyin: Hěn duō dìfang dōu yǒu wifi.
english: A lot of places have wifi.

hanzi: 我 的 很 多 朋友 都 有 车。
pinyin: Wǒ de  hěn duō péngyou dōu yǒu chē.
english: A lot of my friends have cars.

hanzi: 很 多 美国人 都 喜欢 喝 咖啡 。
pinyin: Hěn duō  Měiguó rén dōu xǐhuan hē kāfēi.
english: A lot of Americans like drinking coffee.

hanzi: 很 多 孩子 都 不 喜欢 上学。
pinyin: Hěn duō háizi dōu bù xǐhuan shàngxué.
english: A lot of kids don't like to go to school.

hanzi: 很 多 年轻人 都 想 在 大 城市 工作。
pinyin: Hěn duō niánqīng rén dōu xiǎng zài dà chéngshì gōngzuò.
english: A lot of young people want to go to work in big cities.

hanzi: 大家 都 来 了 吗？
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu lái le ma?
english: Is everyone here?

hanzi: 大家 都 应该 知道。
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu yīnggāi zhīdào.
english: Everyone should know.

hanzi: 大家 都 说 你 很 聪明。
pinyin: Dàjiā  dōu shuō nǐ hěn cōngming.
english: Everyone says you're smart.

hanzi: 大家 都 忘 了 他 的 名字。
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu wàng le tā de míngzi.
english: Everyone forgot his name.

hanzi: 大家 都 喜欢 吃辣 吗？
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu xǐhuan chī là ma?
english: Does everyone like eating spicy food?

hanzi: 我 每天 都 要 上班 。
pinyin: Wǒ měi tiān  dōu yào shàngbān.
english: I have to go to work every day.

hanzi: 老师 每天 都 迟到。
pinyin: Lǎoshī měi tiān  dōu chídào.
english: The teacher comes late every day.

hanzi: 她 每天 都 不 吃 早饭。
pinyin: Tā měi tiān dōu bù chī zǎofàn.
english: Every day, she does not eat breakfast.

hanzi: 我 女朋友 每天 都 上 淘宝 。
pinyin: Wǒ  nǚpéngyou měi tiān dōu shàng Táobǎo.
english: My girlfriend goes on Taobao every day.

hanzi: 妈妈 每天 都 给 我们 做 晚饭。
pinyin: Māma měi tiān dōu gěi wǒmen zuò wǎnfàn.
english: Mom cooks dinner for us every day.

hanzi: 美国人 都 说 英文。
pinyin: Měiguó rén dōu shuō Yīngwén.
english: Americans all speak English.

hanzi: 我们 五 个 人 都 去。
pinyin: Wǒmen wǔ gè rén dōu qù.
english: All five of us are going.

hanzi: 四川人 都 喜欢 吃辣。
pinyin: Sìchuān rén dōu xǐhuan chī là.
english: Sichuanese people all like eating spicy food.

hanzi: 我 的 家人 都 没 去 过 中国。
pinyin: Wǒ de jiārén dōu méi qù guo Zhōngguó.
english: None of my family members has been to China.

hanzi: 我 的 学生 都 喜欢 问 问题。
pinyin: Wǒ de xuéshēng dōu xǐhuan wèn wèntí.
english: My students all like to ask questions.

hanzi: 她 在 看 书。
pinyin: Tā zài kànshū.
english: She is reading.

hanzi: 妈妈 在 打 电话。
pinyin: Māma zài dǎ diànhuà.
english: Mom is making a phone call.

hanzi: 谁 在 里面 洗澡？
pinyin: Shéi zài lǐmiàn xǐzǎo?
english: Who is taking a shower in there?

hanzi: 阿姨 正在 打扫 我们 的 房间。
pinyin: Āyí zhèngzài dǎsǎo wǒmen de fángjiān.
english: The cleaning lady is cleaning our room right now.

hanzi: 昨天 晚上 七点，我们 在 吃饭。
pinyin: Zuótiān wǎnshang qīdiǎn, wǒmen zài chīfàn.
english: Yesterday at 7pm, we were eating dinner.

hanzi: 老板 在 开会，没有 时间 见 你。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn zài kāihuì, méiyǒu shíjiān jiàn nǐ.
english: The boss is currently in a meeting. He doesn't have time to see you.

hanzi: 我 现在 在 上班，不方便 离开。
pinyin: Wǒ xiànzài zài shàngbān, bù fāngbiàn líkāi.
english: I am working now. It's not convenient for me to leave.

hanzi: 我们 正在 上课，请 你 等 一会儿。
pinyin: Wǒmen zhèngzài shàngkè, qǐng nǐ děng yīhuìr.
english: We are in class right now; please wait a moment.

hanzi: 你 正在 开车，不 可以 玩 手机。
pinyin: Nǐ zhèngzài kāichē, bù kěyǐ wán shǒujī.
english: You're driving right now; you can't play with your cell phone.

hanzi: 你 给 我 打 电话 的时候，我 正在 跟 朋友 打 游戏 。
pinyin: Nǐ gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà de shíhou, wǒ zhèngzài gēn péngyou dǎ yóuxì.
english: When you called me, I was playing video games with friends.

hanzi: 我 一直 在 学习 中文 。
pinyin: Wǒ yīzhí zài xuéxí Zhōngwén.
english: I've been studying Chinese all along.

hanzi: 昨天 晚上 我 一直 在 做作业。
pinyin: Zuótiān wǎnshang wǒ yīzhí zài zuò zuòyè.
english: Yesterday evening I was continuously doing homework.

hanzi: 老板 一直 很 忙 。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn yīzhí hěn máng.
english: The boss is always very busy.

hanzi: 我 一直 很 喜欢 你。
pinyin: Wǒ yīzhí hěn xǐhuan nǐ.
english: I've always liked you a lot.

hanzi: 爸爸 一直 都 不 抽烟。
pinyin: Bàba yīzhí dōu bù chōuyān.
english: Dad has never smoked cigarettes.

hanzi: 我 男朋友 一直在 中国 教 英文。
pinyin: Wǒ nánpéngyou yīzhí zài Zhōngguó jiāo Yīngwén.
english: My boyfriend has always been teaching English in China.

hanzi: 18 岁 以后 ， 他 一直 一个人 住。
pinyin: Shíbā suì yǐhòu, tā yīzhí yīgèrén zhù.
english: Since he was 18, he has always lived alone.

hanzi: 你 一直 在 这 家 公司 工作 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ yīzhí zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò ma?
english: Have you always worked in this company?

hanzi: 你们 一直 住 在 一起 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen yīzhí zhù zài yīqǐ ma?
english: Have you always been living together?

hanzi: 北京 的 空气 一直 很 不 好。
pinyin: Běijīng de kōngqì yīzhí hěn bù hǎo.
english: The air in Beijing has been bad for a while.

hanzi: 他们 已经 走 了。
pinyin: Tāmen yǐjīng zǒu le.
english: They've already left.

hanzi: 我 已经 有 男朋友 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng yǒu nánpéngyou le.
english: I already have a boyfriend.

hanzi: 宝宝 已经 会 说话 了。
pinyin: Bǎobao yǐjīng huì shuōhuà le.
english: The baby can already speak.

hanzi: 妈妈 已经 回来 了。
pinyin: Māma yǐjīng huílái le.
english: Mom has already come back.

hanzi: 他 已经 上 飞机 了。
pinyin: Tā yǐjīng shàng fēijī le.
english: He's already gotten on the plane.

hanzi: 爸爸 妈妈 已经 老 了。
pinyin: Bàba māma yǐjīng lǎo le.
english: Mom and dad are already old.

hanzi: 已经 很 便宜 了。
pinyin: Yǐjīng hěn piányi le.
english: It is already very cheap.

hanzi: 你 女朋友 已经 很 漂亮 了！
pinyin: Nǐ nǚpéngyou yǐjīng hěn piàoliang le!
english: Your girlfriend is already very beautiful!

hanzi: 你 的 感冒 已经 好 了 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ de gǎnmào yǐjīng hǎo le ma?
english: Is your cold already better?

hanzi: 已经 很 晚 了，我们 走 吧。
pinyin: Yǐjīng hěn wǎn le, wǒmen zǒu ba.
english: It's already really late. Let's go.

hanzi: 已经 11点 了，女儿 还 没 回来 。
pinyin: Yǐjīng shíyī diǎn le, nǚ'ér hái méi huílái.
english: It is already 11 o'clock, and my daughter has not returned.

hanzi: 爷爷 已经 八十五 岁 了 。
pinyin: Yéye yǐjīng bāshí-wǔ suì le.
english: Grandpa is already eighty-five years old.

hanzi: 我 学习 中文 已经 一 年 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ xuéxí Zhōngwén yǐjīng yī nián le.
english: I have already been studying Chinese for a year.

hanzi: 他 在 洗手间 里 已经 半 个 小时 了 。
pinyin: Tā zài xǐshǒujiān lǐ yǐjīng bàn gè xiǎoshí le.
english: He has already been in the bathroom for half an hour.

hanzi: 爸爸 去 北京 出差 已经 两 天 了 。
pinyin: Bàba qù Běijīng chūchāi yǐjīng liǎng tiān le.
english: It has already been two days since dad went to Beijing on business trip.

hanzi: 我 已经 不 喜欢 你 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng bù xǐhuan nǐ le.
english: I don't like you anymore.

hanzi: 他 已经 不 爱 他 的 猫 了 。
pinyin: Tā yǐjīng bù ài tā de māo le.
english: He doesn't love his cat anymore.

hanzi: 他们 已经 不 住 在 中国 了 。
pinyin: Tāmen yǐjīng bù zhù zài Zhōngguó le.
english: They don't live in China anymore.

hanzi: 我 已经 不 需要 父母 的 钱 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng bù xūyào fùmǔ de qián le.
english: I don't need my parents' money anymore.

hanzi: 你 已经 不 在 Google 工作 了 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ yǐjīng bù zài Google gōngzuò le ma?
english: You don't work at Google anymore?

hanzi: 他 总是 迟到。
pinyin: Tā zǒngshì chídào.
english: He is always late.

hanzi: 我 总是 忘记 这 个 词。
pinyin: Wǒ zǒngshì wàngjì zhège cí.
english: I always forget this word.

hanzi: 他 总是 一个人 吃饭。
pinyin: Tā zǒngshì yīgèrén chīfàn.
english: He always eats alone.

hanzi: 你 男朋友 总是  说 脏话。
pinyin: Nǐ nánpéngyou zǒngshì shuō zānghuà.
english: Your boyfriend always uses foul language.

hanzi: 我 的 学生 总是 问 我 很多 有意思 的 问题。
pinyin: Wǒ de xuéshēng zǒngshì wèn wǒ hěn duō yǒu yìsi de wèntí.
english: My students always ask me lots of interesting questions.

hanzi: 他 总是 很 累。
pinyin: Tā zǒngshì hěn lèi.
english: He is always tired.

hanzi: 你 为什么 总是 很 忙？
pinyin: Nǐ wèishénme zǒngshì hěn máng?
english: Why are you always very busy?

hanzi: 你 家 总是 很 干净。
pinyin: Nǐ jiā zǒngshì hěn gānjìng.
english: Your house is always very clean.

hanzi: 孩子们 总是 非常 开心。
pinyin: Háizi men zǒngshì fēicháng kāixīn.
english: The children are always very happy.

hanzi: 我 的 学生 总是 特别 努力。
pinyin: Wǒ de xuéshēng zǒngshì tèbié nǔlì.
english: My students are always very hard-working.

hanzi: 她 有 一 个 弟弟，还 有 一 个 妹妹。
pinyin: Tā yǒu yī gè dìdi, hái yǒu yī gè mèimei.
english: She has a younger brother and also has a younger sister.

hanzi: 我 老板 会 说 法语，还 会 说 日语。
pinyin: Wǒ lǎobǎn huì shuō Fǎyǔ, hái huì shuō Rìyǔ.
english: My boss can speak French and can also speak Japanese.

hanzi: 你 要 一 杯 咖啡，还 要 什么？
pinyin: Nǐ yào yī bēi kāfēi, hái yào shénme?
english: You want a cup of coffee, and what else do you want?

hanzi: 我 想 吃 冰淇淋，还 想 吃 汉堡。
pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng chī bīngqílín, hái xiǎng chī hànbǎo.
english: I want to eat ice cream and I also want to eat a hamburger.

hanzi: 爸爸 有 一个 小米 手机，还 有 一个 iPhone。
pinyin: Bàba yǒu yī gè Xiǎomǐ shǒujī, hái yǒu yī gè iPhone.
english: Dad has a Xiaomi phone and also has an iPhone.

hanzi: 你 晚上 在家 做 了 作业，还 做 了 什么？
pinyin: Nǐ wǎnshang zài jiā zuò le zuòyè, hái zuò le shénme?
english: You did your homework at home tonight, and what else did you do?

hanzi: 他 结婚 的 时候，请 了 同事，还 请 了 谁？
pinyin: Tā jiéhūn de shíhou, qǐng le tóngshì, hái  qǐng le shéi?
english: When he got married, he invited his co-workers. Who else did he invite?

hanzi: 生日 的 时候，我们 会 吃 蛋糕，还 要 送 礼物。
pinyin: Shēngrì de shíhou, wǒmen huì chī dàngāo, hái yào sòng lǐwù.
english: During a birthday, we eat cake and also give presents.

hanzi: 去 美国 要 带 钱、护照，还 要 带 什么？
pinyin: Qù Měiguó yào dài qián, hùzhào, hái yào dài shénme?
english: To go to the USA, you need to take money and a passport. What else do you need to take with you?

hanzi: 他 做 了 饭 ， 还 洗 了 碗。
pinyin: Tā zuò le fàn, hái xǐ le wǎn.
english: He fixed dinner and also washed the dishes.

hanzi: 她 也 洗 了 碗。
pinyin: Tā yě xǐ le wǎn.
english: She washed the dishes too.

hanzi: 我 洗 了 澡， 还 洗 了 衣服。
pinyin: Wǒ xǐ le zǎo, hái xǐ le yīfu.
english: I took a shower and also did my laundry.

hanzi: 她 也 洗 了 衣服。
pinyin: Tā  yě xǐ le yīfu.
english: She did her laundry too.

hanzi: 我们 今天 晚上 出去 吃饭 了，还 看 了 电影 。
pinyin: Wǒmen jīntiān wǎnshang chūqù chīfàn le, hái kàn le diànyǐng.
english: We went out for dinner tonight and also watched a movie.

hanzi: 他们 今天 晚上 也 看 了 电影 。
pinyin: Tāmen jīntiān wǎnshang yě kàn le diànyǐng.
english: They watched a movie tonight too.

hanzi: 我们 刚 知道。
pinyin: Wǒmen gāng zhīdào.
english: We just found out.

hanzi: 她们 刚 走。
pinyin: Tāmen gāng zǒu.
english: They just left.

hanzi: 老板 刚刚 到 办公室。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn gānggāng dào bàngōngshì.
english: The boss just arrived at the office.

hanzi: 我 老婆 刚 生 完 孩子。
pinyin: Wǒ lǎopo gāng shēng wán háizi.
english: My wife just finished giving birth to our baby.

hanzi: 你 刚刚 下班 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ gānggāng xiàbān ma?
english: Did you just get off work?

hanzi: 我 刚 认识 她  十 天。
pinyin: Wǒ gāng rènshi tā shí tiān.
english: I just met her ten days ago.

hanzi: 他 刚 来 中国 两 个 月。
pinyin: Tā gāng lái Zhōngguó liǎng gè yuè.
english: He just got to China two months ago.

hanzi: 我 弟弟 刚 工作 半年。
pinyin: Wǒ dìdi gāng gōngzuò  bàn nián .
english: My younger brother just started working half a year ago.

hanzi: 她  刚 结婚  三 个 月 。
pinyin: Tā gāng jiéhūn sān gè yuè.
english: She just got married three months ago.

hanzi: 我 的 车 刚 买 两 天，开 的时候 小心 点。
pinyin: Wǒ de chē gāng mǎi liǎng tiān, kāi de shíhou xiǎoxīn diǎn.
english: I just bought the car two days ago. Be careful when you drive.

hanzi: 我 只 有 一 个 哥哥。
pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ yǒu yī gè gēge.

pinyin: Wǒmen zhǐ yǒu shí kuài qián.

pinyin: Wǒmen gōngsī zhǐ yǒu liǎng gè yuángōng.

hanzi: 你 只 爱 吃 肉 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ zhǐ ài chī ròu ma?

hanzi: 他们 只 会 说 英文。
pinyin: Tāmen zhǐ huì shuō Yīngwén.

pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ néng shuō liǎng jù Zhōngwén.

hanzi: 你们 只 要 咖啡 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen zhǐ yào kāfēi ma?

pinyin: Wǒ lǎopo zhǐ yào yī gè háizi.

pinyin: Bǎobao zhǐ huì zǒu, bù huì pǎo.

pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng gēn nǐ zài yīqǐ.
english: I only want to be with you.

hanzi: 你 喜欢 喝 奶茶，我们 就 买 奶茶 吧。
pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan hē nǎichá, wǒmen jiù mǎi nǎichá ba.
english: So you like milk tea. Then we'll buy milk tea.

pinyin: Nǐ zuì yǒu jīngyàn,  jiù tīng nǐ de ba.
english: You have the most experience. We'll just listen to you.

pinyin: Wǒ tīngdào zhège huài xiāoxi, jiù gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà le.

pinyin: Nǐ xiànzài shēntǐ bù hǎo, jiù bù yào hē jiǔ le..
english: Your health isn't good now. So just stop drinking.

pinyin: Tā zuìjìn tài lèi le, jiù shēngbìng le.
english: He's been too tired recently, and then he got sick.

pinyin: Jīntiān xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù chūqù le.
english: It's going to rain today. So let's just not go out.

pinyin: Tā māma méiyǒu gěi tā mǎi shūbāo, tā jiù kū le.
english: His mom didn't buy him the backpack, and then he just started crying.

hanzi: 就 在 这 家 店 吃饭 吧，那 家 店 人 太 多 了。
pinyin: Jiù zài zhè jiā diàn chīfàn ba, nà jiā diàn rén tài duō le .
english: Let's just eat at this restaurant. That one is too crowded.

pinyin: Jiù qù kàn diànyǐng ba.

hanzi: 别 走。

pinyin: Bié shuōhuà!

pinyin: Bié xiào!

pinyin: Bié dòng!

pinyin: Bié dǎ háizi!

pinyin: Hējiǔ yǐhòu bié kāichē.

pinyin: Chīfàn de shíhou bié wán shǒujī.
english: When eating, don't play with your cell phone.

pinyin: Shàngkè de shíhou bié shuō Yīngwén.

pinyin: Bùyào yībiān  chī dōngxi, yībiān shuōhuà.

hanzi: 我 常常 一边 洗澡， 一边 唱歌 。
pinyin: Wǒ chángcháng yībiān xǐzǎo, yībiān chànggē.

pinyin: Háizi xǐhuan yībiān chīfàn, yībiān wán.

pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan yībiān tīng yīnyuè, yībiān zuò zuòyè ma?

pinyin: Wǒmen yībiān zǒu yībiān liáo ba.

pinyin: Qǐng nǐ yībiān dú yībiān xiě.
english: Please write as you read.

pinyin: Bùyào yībiān kāichē, yībiān dǎ diànhuà.
english: Don't talk on the phone while you drive.

pinyin: Lǎobǎn xǐhuan yībiān chōuyān, yībiān gōngzuò.

pinyin: Hěn duō rén dōu yībiān shàngbān, yībiān wán shǒujī.

pinyin: Tā chángcháng yībiān zuòfàn, yībiān dài háizi.
english: She often looks after the baby while cooking food.

pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào Shànghǎi de fángzi duō guì ma?

pinyin: Měiguó wénhuà gēn Zhōngguó wénhuà bù yīyàng.

pinyin: Zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn wǒ lǎojiā yīyàng shūfu.

pinyin: Nǐ gēn lǎobǎn yīyàng máng ma?

pinyin: Wǒ yǒudiǎn è.

pinyin: Shànghǎi de dōngtiān yòu lěng yòu shī.

pinyin: Wǒ juéde tā bù tài cōngming.

pinyin: Wǒ bù tài huì shuō Yīngyǔ.

pinyin: Tāmen bù tài xiǎng qù.

pinyin: Nǐ zhēn hǎo!

hanzi: 你 女朋友 真 漂亮！
pinyin: Nǐ nǚpéngyou zhēn piàoliang!

hanzi: 他 家 真 有钱！
pinyin: Tā jiā zhēn yǒuqián!

pinyin: Xiǎogǒu zhēn kě'ài!

hanzi: 今天 真 热！
pinyin: Jīntiān zhēn rè!

pinyin: Nǐ māma zhēn ài nǐ!

pinyin: Chī wán wǔfàn  yǐhòu, wǒmen yào kāihuì.

pinyin: Èrshí nián yǐqián,   zhèlǐ shì yī gè gōngyuán.

pinyin: Bìyè yǐqián,  wǒ yào zhǎodào gōngzuò.

pinyin: Yǐqián wǒ bù huì shuō Zhōngwén.

pinyin: Wǒ fùmǔ yǐqián dōu shì lǎoshī.

pinyin: Wǒ  shēngqì de shíhou, qǐng nǐ bùyào xiào.

pinyin: Māma bù zài jiā de shíhou, wǒ zìjǐ zuòfàn.

pinyin: Nǐ bù xiǎng lái wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò ma?
english: Do you not want to come to work for our company?

pinyin: Qùnián tā qù Měiguó gōngzuò le jǐ gè yuè.
english: Last year she went to work in the USA for a few months.

hanzi: 你们 想 去 Starbucks 还是 Costa？
pinyin: Nǐmen xiǎng qù Starbucks háishì Costa?
english: Would you like to go to Starbucks or Costa?

hanzi: 周末 我 喜欢 去 朋友 家。
pinyin: Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuan qù péngyou jiā.
english: I like to go to my friends' places on the weekends.

hanzi: 爸爸 明天 去 北京 出差。
pinyin: Bàba míngtiān qù Běijīng chūchāi.
english: Dad will go to Beijing on a business trip tomorrow.

hanzi: 我 今天 不 上班，你们 可以 来 我 家 吃饭 。
pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān bù shàngbān, nǐmen kěyǐ lái wǒ jiā chīfàn.
english: I don't have to go to work today. You can come to my home to eat dinner.

hanzi: 请 进 。
pinyin: Qǐng jìn.
english: Please come in.

hanzi: 请 坐 。
pinyin: Qǐng zuò.
english: Please sit down.

hanzi: 请 说 。
pinyin: Qǐng shuō.
english: Please speak.

hanzi: 请 喝 茶 。
pinyin: Qǐng hē chá.
english: Please have some tea.

hanzi: 请 不要 迟到 。
pinyin: Qǐng bùyào chídào.
english: Please do not be late.

hanzi: 请 尝 一 尝 。
pinyin: Qǐng cháng yī cháng.
english: Please have a taste.

hanzi: 请 你 说 得 慢 一点  。
pinyin: Qǐng nǐ shuō de màn yīdiǎn.
english: Please speak more slowly.

hanzi: 请 你 听 老师 的 话 。
pinyin: Qǐng nǐ tīng lǎoshī de huà.
english: Please listen to the teacher.

hanzi: 请 你 离开 。
pinyin: Qǐng nǐ líkāi.
english: Please leave.

hanzi: 请问 ， 洗手间 在 哪里 。
pinyin: Qǐng wèn, xǐshǒujiān zài nǎlǐ?
english: Excuse me, where is the restroom?

hanzi: 你 可 不 可以 …… ？
pinyin: Nǐ kě bu kěyǐ…?
english: Could you...?

hanzi: 你 能 不 能 …… ？
pinyin: Nǐ néng bu néng…?
english: Can you...?

hanzi: 麻烦 你 ……
pinyin: Máfan nǐ…
english: Can I trouble you to... (?)

hanzi: 你 要 什么？
pinyin: Nǐ yào shénme?
english: What do you want?

hanzi: 我 要 一 杯 水。
pinyin: Wǒ yào yī bēi shuǐ.
english: I want a cup of water.

hanzi: 你们 都 要 冰 可乐 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen dōu yào bīng kělè ma?
english: Do you all want coke with ice?

hanzi: 你 要 茶 还是 咖啡？
pinyin: Nǐ yào chá háishì kāfēi?
english: Do you want tea or coffee?

hanzi: 我们 要 三 碗 米饭。
pinyin: Wǒmen yào sān wǎn mǐfàn.
english: We want three bowls of rice.

hanzi: 你 要 喝 什么 酒？
pinyin: Nǐ yào hē shénme jiǔ?
english: What kind of wine do you want to drink?

hanzi: 爸爸 要 买 一 个 新 手机。
pinyin: Bàba yào mǎi yī gè xīn shǒujī.
english: Dad wants to buy a new cell phone.

hanzi: 我 要 跟 你 一起 去。
pinyin: Wǒ yào gēn nǐ yīqǐ qù.
english: I want to go with you.

hanzi: 她 要 去 大城市 找 工作。
pinyin: Tā yào qù dà chéngshì zhǎo gōngzuò.
english: She wants to go to a big city to find a job.

hanzi: 周末 你们 要 一起 看 电影 吗？
pinyin: Zhōumò nǐmen yào yīqǐ kàn diànyǐng ma?
english: Do you want to go see a movie together this weekend?

hanzi: 你 要 早 点 睡觉。
pinyin: Nǐ yào zǎo diǎn shuìjiào.
english: You need to go to bed earlier.

hanzi: 我们 明天 要 上班。
pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān yào shàngbān.
english: We need to work tomorrow.

hanzi: 老板 今天 要 见 一个 新 客户。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn jīntiān yào jiàn yī gè xīn kèhù.
english: Today the boss needs to see a new client.

pinyin: Lǎoshī tài lèi le, yào hǎohǎo xiūxi.
english: The teacher is too tired. She needs to rest well.

hanzi: 明天 下雨， 你 要 带 伞。
pinyin: Míngtiān xiàyǔ, nǐ yào dài sǎn.
english: It's going to rain tomorrow; you need to bring an umbrella.

hanzi: 星期五 我们 要 开会。
pinyin: Xīngqīwǔ wǒmen yào kāihuì.
english: We are going to have a meeting on Friday.

hanzi: 12 点 我 要 去 吃饭。
pinyin: Shí'èr diǎn wǒ yào qù chīfàn.
english: I am going to go eat at 12 o'clock.

hanzi: 老板 下周 要 出差 吗？
pinyin: Lǎobǎn xià zhōu yào chūchāi ma?
english: Is the boss going on a business trip next week?

hanzi: 他们 明年 要 结婚 了。
pinyin: Tāmen míngnián yào jiéhūn le.
english: They are going to get married next year.

hanzi: 今年 你 要 回家 过年 吗？
pinyin: Jīnnián nǐ yào huíjiā guònián ma?
english: Are you going to return home this year to celebrate the Chinese New Year?

hanzi: 在 中国， 你 应该 喝 白酒。
pinyin: Zài Zhōngguó, nǐ yīnggāi hē báijiǔ.
english: In China, you should drink baijiu.

pinyin: Wǒ yīnggāi gěi nǐ duōshao qián?
english: How much money should I give you?

pinyin: Gǎnmào de shíhou yīnggāi hē rè shuǐ.
english: You should drink hot water when you have a cold.

hanzi: 明天 你 应该 八 点 半 来 公司。
pinyin: Míngtiān nǐ yīnggāi bādiǎn bàn lái gōngsī.
english: You should come to the office tomorrow at 8:30.

hanzi: 他 太 累 了，应该 回家 休息。
pinyin: Tā tài lèi le, yīnggāi huíjiā xiūxi.
english: He's too tired. He should go home and rest.

hanzi: 你 不 应该 告诉 他。
pinyin: Nǐ bù yīnggāi gàosu tā.
english: You should not tell him.

hanzi: 他 不 应该 打 人。
pinyin: Tā bù yīnggāi dǎ rén.
english: He should not hit people.

hanzi: 我们 不 应该 迟到。
pinyin: Wǒmen bù yīnggāi chídào.
english: We shouldn't be late.

hanzi: 你们 不 应该 笑 她。
pinyin: Nǐmen bù yīnggāi xiào tā.
english: You shouldn't laugh at her.

hanzi: 你们 不 应该 拿 别人 的 东西。
pinyin: Nǐmen bù yīnggāi ná biérén de dōngxi.
english: You should not take other people's stuff.

hanzi: 明天 你 会 来 吗 ？
pinyin: Míngtiān nǐ huì lái ma?
english: Will you come tomorrow?

hanzi: 他 会 来 看 你 吗？
pinyin: Tā huì lái kàn nǐ ma?
english: Will he come to see you?

hanzi: 明天 会 下雨 吗？
pinyin: Míngtiān huì xiàyǔ ma?
english: Will it rain tomorrow?

hanzi: 我 出去 一下，很 快 会 回来。
pinyin: Wǒ chūqù yīxià, hěnkuài huì huílái.
english: I'm going out for a little while. I'll come back very soon.

hanzi: 老板 会 同意 吗？
pinyin: Lǎobǎn huì  tóngyì ma?
english: Will the boss agree?

hanzi: 你 女儿 会 听 你 的 话。
pinyin: Nǐ nǚér huì tīng nǐ de huà.
english: Your daughter will listen to you.

hanzi: 下班 以后 ， 我 会 给 你 打 电话。
pinyin: Xiàbān yǐhòu, wǒ huì gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà.
english: After getting off work, I will give you a call.

hanzi: 我们  不 会 告诉 你。
pinyin: Wǒmen bù huì gàosu nǐ.
english: We won't tell you.

hanzi: 他 不 会 跟 你 结婚 。
pinyin: Tā bù huì gēn nǐ jiéhūn.
english: He won't marry you.

hanzi: 今晚 我 不 会 在 外面 吃饭 。
pinyin: Jīnwǎn wǒ bù huì zài wàimiàn chīfàn.
english: Tonight I will not eat out.

hanzi: 你 想 去 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng qù ma?
english: Would you like to go?

hanzi: 我 想 吃 面。
pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng chī miàn.
english: I would like to eat noodles.

hanzi: 你 想 喝 水 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē shuǐ ma?
english: Would you like to drink some water?

hanzi: 我们 想 看 电视。
pinyin: Wǒmen xiǎng kàn diànshì.
english: We would like to watch TV.

hanzi: 他 想 买 一 个 大 房子。
pinyin: Tā xiǎng mǎi yī gè dà fángzi.
english: He would like to buy a big apartment.

hanzi: 他们 不 想 去 酒吧。
pinyin: Tāmen bù xiǎng qù jiǔbā.
english: They wouldn't like to go to the bar.

hanzi: 你 不 想 认识 这个 美女 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ  bù xiǎng rènshi zhège měinǚ ma?
english: Would you not like to know this beautiful lady?

hanzi: 我 不 想 回家。
pinyin: Wǒ bù xiǎng huíjiā.
english: I wouldn't like to return home.

hanzi: 那个 地方 很 近，我 不 想 开车。
pinyin: Nàge dìfang hěn jìn, wǒ bù xiǎng kāichē.
english: That place is so close. I would not like to drive.

hanzi: 他  不 想 花 父母 的 钱。
pinyin: Tā bù xiǎng huā  fùmǔ de qián.
english: He would not like to spend his parents' money.

hanzi: 我 要 回家 吃饭。
pinyin: Wǒ yào huíjiā chīfàn.
english: I want to go home and eat.

hanzi: 你 要 去 超市 买 东西 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ yào qù chāoshì mǎi dōngxi ma?
english: Are you going to the supermarket to buy things?

pinyin: Tā bù xiǎng qù túshūguǎn kàn shū.
english: He doesn't want to go to the library and read.

hanzi: 你 打 电话 告诉 他 了 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ dǎ diànhuà gàosu tā le ma?
english: Did you call and tell him?

hanzi: 我们 要 坐 飞机 去 美国。
pinyin: Wǒmen yào zuò  fēijī  qù Měiguó.
english: We are going to take an airplane to go to the USA.

hanzi: 你们 可以 上 网 买 机票 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen kěyǐ shàng wǎng mǎi jīpiào ma?
english: Can you use the Internet to buy airplane tickets?

pinyin: Lǎobǎn xià zhōu qù Běijīng kāi huì.
english: Next week the boss will go to Beijing to have a meeting.

hanzi: 中国人 都 要 回家 过 年。
pinyin: Zhōngguó rén dōu yào huíjiā guònián.
english: Chinese people all go back home for Chinese New Year.

hanzi: 周末 我 喜欢 自己 买 菜 做饭。
pinyin: Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuan zìjǐ mǎi cài zuòfàn.
english: I like to buy food to cook for myself on the weekend.

pinyin: Zǎoshang wǒ xiān shuā yá xǐ liǎn, zài chī zǎofàn.
english: In the morning, I first brush my teeth and wash my face, and then I eat breakfast.

hanzi: 这 句 话 很 难 懂。
pinyin: Zhè jù huà hěn nán dǒng.
english: This sentence is hard to understand.

pinyin: Hànyǔ hěn nán xué.

hanzi: 中国菜 很 难 做。
pinyin: Zhōngguó cài hěn nán zuò.

hanzi: 这 个 东西 现在 很 难 买。
pinyin: Zhège dōngxi xiànzài hěn nán mǎi.
english: This thing is really difficult to purchase now.

hanzi: 这 个 汉字 很  难 写。
pinyin: Zhège Hànzì hěn  nán xiě.
english: This character is very difficult to write.

hanzi: 你 做 的 菜 很 难吃。
pinyin: Nǐ zuò de cài hěn nánchī.
english: The dishes you cook taste bad.

hanzi: 这里 的 咖啡 很 难喝。
pinyin: Zhè lǐ de kāfēi hěn nánhē.
english: The coffee here tastes bad.

hanzi: 这 首 歌 很 难听。
pinyin: Zhè shǒu gē hěn nántīng.
english: This song is terrible (hard to listen to).

hanzi: 这 种 花 很 难闻。
pinyin: Zhè zhǒng huā hěn nánwén.
english: This kind of flower smells bad.

hanzi: 这 件 衣服 很 难看吗？
pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu hěn nánkàn ma?
english: Is this article of clothing ugly?

hanzi: 他 学 了 一 年 中文 。
pinyin: Tā xué le yī nián Zhōngwén.
english: He studied Chinese for a year.

hanzi: 我 看 了  一 个 晚上 书 。
pinyin: Wǒ  kàn le  yī gè wǎnshang shū.
english: I read books all evening.

hanzi: 他 做 了 八 年 经理 。
pinyin: Tā zuò le bā nián jīnglǐ.
english: He worked as a manager for eight years.

hanzi: 我们 坐 了 十五 个 小时 的 飞机 。
pinyin: Wǒmen zuò le  shíwǔ gè xiǎoshí de fēijī.
english: We took a fifteen hour flight.

hanzi: 奶奶 看 了 一 天 的 电视 。
pinyin: Nǎinai kàn le yī tiān de diànshì.
english: Grandma watched TV all day.

hanzi: 妈妈 洗 了 一 上午 的 衣服 。
pinyin: Māma xǐ le yī shàngwǔ de yīfu.
english: Mom washed clothes all morning.

hanzi: 孩子们 周六 写 了 一天 的 作业 。
pinyin: Háizi men zhōuliù xiě le yī tiān de zuòyè.
english: The kids did their homework all day Saturday.

hanzi: 我 刚才 打 了 半 个 小时 电话 。
pinyin: Wǒ gāngcái dǎ le bàn gè xiǎoshí diànhuà.
english: I was on the phone for half an hour.

hanzi: 我 昨天 玩 了 一 晚上 游戏 。
pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān wán le yī wǎnshang yóuxì.
english: Yesterday, I played games all evening.

hanzi: 他 昨天 开 了 一 天 的 车 。
pinyin: Tā zuótiān kāi le yī tiān chē.
english: He drove all day yesterday.

hanzi: 老板 今天 开 了 一 下午 的 会 。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn kāi le yī xiàwǔ de huì.
english: The boss had meetings all afternoon today.

hanzi: 她 从来 不 喝酒。
pinyin: Tā cónglái bù hējiǔ.
english: She never drinks.

hanzi: 我 女朋友 从 不 给 我 打 电话。
pinyin: Wǒ nǚpéngyou cóng bù gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà.
english: My girlfriend never calls me.

hanzi: 这 个 人 很 奇怪，他 从来 不 笑。
pinyin: Zhège rén hěn qíguài, tā cónglái bù xiào.
english: This person is very strange. He never laughs.

hanzi: 你 父母 从来 不 打 你 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ fùmǔ cónglái bù dǎ nǐ ma?
english: Your parents never hit you?

hanzi: 他 从 不 关心 别人。
pinyin: Tā cóng bù guānxīn biérén.
english: He never cares about other people.

hanzi: 你 从来 没有 想 过 这 个 问题 吗？
pinyin: Nǐ cónglái méiyǒu xiǎng guo zhège wèntí ma?
english: Have you never thought about this question?

hanzi: 她 从来 没 见 过 她 妈妈。
pinyin: Tā cónglái méi jiàn guo tā māma.
english: She has never met her mother.

hanzi: 我 从没 学 过 这 个 词。
pinyin: Wǒ cóngméi xué guo zhège cí.
english: I have never before studied this word.

hanzi: 你们 从来 没有 听说 过 这 个 地方 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen cónglái méiyǒu tīngshuō guo zhège dìfang ma?
english: Have you never heard about this place before?

hanzi: 很 多 中国人 从来 没 出  过 国。
pinyin: Hěn duō Zhōngguó rén cónglái méi chū  guo guó.
english: A lot of Chinese people have never been abroad.

hanzi: 你 睡 了 一 天 了。
pinyin: Nǐ shuì le yī tiān le.
english: You have been sleeping for the whole day.

hanzi: 他 在 北京 住 了 两 年 了。
pinyin: Tā zài Běijīng zhù le liǎng nián le.
english: He has been living in Beijing for two years.

hanzi: 这 个 会，他们 开 了 两 个 小时 了。
pinyin: Zhège huì, tāmen kāi le liǎng gè xiǎoshí le.
english: They've been holding this meeting for the past two hours.

hanzi: 我 在 这儿 等 了 半 个 小时 了。
pinyin: Wǒ zài zhèr děng le bàn gè xiǎoshí le.
english: I have been waiting here for half an hour.

hanzi: 他们 在 酒吧 待 了 一 个 晚上 了。
pinyin: Tāmen zài jiǔbā dāi le yī gè wǎnshang le.
english: They have been staying at the bar for the whole evening.

hanzi: 我 学 中文 学 了 一 年 了。
pinyin: Wǒ xué Zhōngwén xué le yī nián le.
english: I have been learning Chinese for a year.

hanzi: 他 打 电话 打 了 一 个 多 小时 了。
pinyin: Tā dǎ diànhuà dǎ le yī gè duō xiǎoshí le.
english: He has been on the phone for more than an hour.

hanzi: 老板 打 游戏 打 了 一 个 上午 了。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn dǎ yóuxì dǎ le yī gè shàngwǔ le.
english: The boss has been playing video games all morning.

hanzi: 你 洗澡 洗 了 差不多 一 个 小时 了。
pinyin: Nǐ xǐzǎo xǐ le chàbuduō yī gè xiǎoshí le.
english: You have been showering for almost an hour.

hanzi: 妈妈 看电视 看 了 一 晚上 了。
pinyin: Māma kàn diànshì kàn le yī wǎnshang le.
english: Mom has been watching TV all evening.

hanzi: 我们 一起 吃 晚饭 吧。
pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ chī wǎnfàn ba.
english: Let's eat dinner together.

hanzi: 早上 我 和 老公 一起 去 上班。
pinyin: Zǎoshang wǒ hé lǎogōng yīqǐ qù shàngbān.
english: In the morning, I go to work together with my husband.

hanzi: 周末 我们 一起 去 看电影，好 吗？
pinyin: Zhōumò wǒmen yīqǐ qù  kàn diànyǐng, hǎo ma?
english: Let's go to the movies this weekend, shall we?

hanzi: 这 两 个 公司 一起 做 这个 产品。
pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè gōngsī yīqǐ zuò zhège chǎnpǐn.
english: These two businesses made this product together.

hanzi: 下班 以后，你们 一起 来 我 家 吧。
pinyin: Xiàbān yǐhòu, nǐmen yīqǐ lái wǒ jiā ba.
english: After work, why don't you all come to my home together?

hanzi: 下 个 月 我 和 妈妈  一起 去 旅行。
pinyin: Xià gè yuè wǒ hé māma  yīqǐ qù lǚxíng.
english: Next month I'll go on a trip together with mom.

pinyin: Nǐmen yǒu méiyǒu yīqǐ wán guo zhège yóuxì?
english: Have you all ever played this game together?

hanzi: 他 想 和 他太太 一起 学 中文。
pinyin: Tā xiǎng hé tā tàitai yīqǐ xué Zhōngwén.
english: He wants to study Chinese together with his wife.

hanzi: 结婚以后，你 和 父母 会 一起 住 吗？
pinyin: Jiéhūn yǐhòu, nǐ hé fùmǔ huì yīqǐ zhù ma?
english: Will you live together with your parents after you get married?

pinyin: Jīntiān wǎnshang, lǎobǎn yào hé wǒmen yīqǐ jiābān.
english: Tonight the boss is going to to work overtime together with us.

hanzi: 今天 太 忙 了，中午 没 办法  出去 吃饭。
pinyin: Jīntiān tài máng le, zhōngwǔ méi bànfǎ chūqù chīfàn.
english: It's too busy today. There's no way to go out for lunch.

pinyin: Tā méi dài shǒujī, méi bànfǎ gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà.
english: He didn't bring his phone, so he has no way to give me a call.

pinyin: Méiyǒu shuǐ,  wǒmen méi bànfǎ xǐ yīfu.
english: There's no water. There's no way for us to wash clothes.

hanzi: 这里 太 吵 了，我 没 办法 工作。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ tài chǎo le, wǒ méi bànfǎ gōngzuò.
english: It‘s too noisy here. I can't work.

pinyin: Tā bù kāimén, suǒyǐ tā méi bànfǎ jìnqù.
english: He didn't open the door, so she has no way to enter.

hanzi: 你 不 会 说 中文，没 办法 在 我们公司 工作。
pinyin: Nǐ bù huì shuō Zhōngwén, méi bànfǎ zài wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò.
english: You can't speak Chinese, so there is no way for you to work for our company.

hanzi: 事情 太 多 了，我 今天 没 办法 做完。
pinyin: Shìqing tài duō le, wǒ jīntiān  méi bànfǎ zuò wán.
english: There's too much to do. I have no way to finish today.

pinyin: Lǎobǎn bù tóngyì , wǒ méi bànfǎ bāng nǐ.
english: The boss didn't agree, so I have no way to help you.

hanzi: 这里 没有 wifi，我 没 办法 上网。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ méiyǒu wifi，wǒ méi bànfǎ shàngwǎng.
english: There is no wifi here, so I have no way of going online.

hanzi: 他 很 笨，我 没 办法 跟 他 一起 工作。
pinyin: Tā hěn bèn, wǒ méi bànfǎ gēn tā yīqǐ gōngzuò.
english: He's really dumb. There is no way I can work with him.

pinyin: Wǒ zài Shànghǎi shàng dàxué.

pinyin: Nǐ yīzhí zài  zhè jiā gōngsī  gōngzuò ma?

pinyin: Nǐ kànkan.

pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān kěyǐ zuò wán.

pinyin: Jīntiān shì Xīngqīyī, nǐ zěnme bù qù shàngbān?
english: Today is Monday. Why aren't you going to work?

pinyin: Tā qīn le nǐ, nǐ zěnme bù gāoxìng?

pinyin: Tā de xiǎomāo sǐ le, tā zěnme bù nánguò?

pinyin: Měi tiān gōngzuò shí'èr gè xiǎoshí, nǐ zěnme bù lèi?

pinyin: Běijīng de kōngqì zěnme nàme  chà?

pinyin: Nǐ de Hànyǔ zěnme zhème hǎo?

pinyin: Nǐ jīntiān qù shàngbān le ma?

pinyin: Tā xué de hěn kuài, yīnwèi tā hěn cōngming.

pinyin: Wǒ ài chī Sìchuān cài, yīnwèi hěn là.

pinyin: Hànzì tài nán le, suǒyǐ wǒ bù xiǎng xué.

pinyin: Tā hěn piàoliang, suǒyǐ hěn duō nánhái xǐhuan tā.
english: She is beautiful, so a lot of boys like her.

pinyin: Tā zhǎodào gōngzuò le, suǒyǐ hěn gāoxìng.

pinyin: Wǒ tài máng le, suǒyǐ méiyǒu shíjiān gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà.

english: There are a lot of foreigners in our company, so we need to speak English.

pinyin: Yīnwèi wǒ yǒu yī gè Zhōngguó nǚpéngyou, suǒyǐ wǒ yào xué Zhōngwén.
english: Since I have a Chinese girlfriend, I need to study Chinese.

english: Since he was sick, he didn't go to class.

pinyin: Yīnwèi wǒ hěn lèi, suǒyǐ yào xiūxi.

pinyin: Wǒ yào xiūxi.
english: I want to rest.

hanzi: 你 也 要 回家 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ yě yào huíjiā ma?
english: Do you also want to go home?

hanzi: 你们 要 喝 什么 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen yào hē shénme?
english: What do you want to drink?

hanzi: 我 要 帮 老板 做 完 这些 工作 。
pinyin: Wǒ yào  bāng lǎobǎn zuò wán zhèxiē gōngzuò.
english: I want to help the boss finish this work.

hanzi: 大家 晚上 要 不 要 出去 吃 ？
pinyin: Dàjiā wǎnshang yào bu yào chūqù chī?
english: Does everyone want to go out to eat tonight?

hanzi: 你 想 去 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng qù ma?
english: Would you like to go?

hanzi: 我 不 想 见 她 。
pinyin: Wǒ bù xiǎng jiàn tā.
english: I wouldn't like to see her.

hanzi: 周末 你们 想 看 电影 吗 ？
pinyin: Zhōumò nǐmen xiǎng kàn diànyǐng ma?
english: Would you like to see a movie this weekend?

hanzi: 我 想 请 你 吃饭 。
pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ chīfàn.
english: I'd like to treat you to dinner.

hanzi: 他们 春节 不 想 回家 吗 ？
pinyin: Tāmen Chūnjié bù xiǎng huíjiā ma?
english: Don't they want to go back home for Spring Festival?

hanzi: 星期六 我 要 去 北京。
pinyin: Xīngqīliù wǒ yào qù Běijīng.
english: I'm going to Beijing on Saturday.

hanzi: 下 个 月 她 要 找 新 工作。
pinyin: Xià gè yuè tā yào zhǎo xīn gōngzuò.
english: She is going to look for a new job next month.

hanzi: 这个 周末 你们 要 出去 玩 吗？
pinyin: Zhège zhōumò nǐmen yào  chūqù wán ma?
english: Are you going out partying this weekend?

hanzi: 结婚 以后，你 要 跟 父母 住 在 一起 吗？
pinyin: Jiéhūn yǐhòu, nǐ yào  gēn nǐ fùmǔ zhù zài yīqǐ ma?
english: Are you going to live together with your parents after you get married?

hanzi: 生 完 孩子 以后，你 太太 要 回去 工作 吗？
pinyin: Shēng wán háizi yǐhòu, nǐ tàitai yào huíqù gōngzuò ma?
english: Is your wife going back to work after she finishes giving birth to the baby?

hanzi: 你 想要 几 个 孩子 ？
pinyin: Nǐ xiǎngyào jǐ gè háizi?
english: How many kids do you want to have?

hanzi: 我 老婆 总是 想要 最 贵 的 包。
pinyin: Wǒ lǎopo zǒngshì xiǎngyào zuì guì de bāo.
english: My wife always wants the most expensive bags.

hanzi: 她 想要 找 一 个 有钱 的 男朋友 。
pinyin: Tā xiǎngyào zhǎo yī gè yǒuqián de nánpéngyou.
english: She wants to find a rich boyfriend.

hanzi: 你们 为什么 想要 离开 北京 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen wèishénme xiǎngyào líkāi Běijīng?
english: Why do you all want to leave Beijing?

hanzi: 他 想要 帮 你 找 一 个 更好 的 工作。
pinyin: Tā xiǎngyào bāng nǐ zhǎo yī gè gèng hǎo de gōngzuò.
english: He wants to help you find a better job.

hanzi: 这个 主意 好 极了 。
pinyin: Zhège zhǔyi hǎo jíle.
english: This idea is perfect.

hanzi: 味道 好 极了 !
pinyin: Wèidào hǎo jíle!
english: The taste is perfect!

hanzi: 他 的 英文 棒 极了 。
pinyin: Tā de Yīngwén bàng jíle.
english: His English is perfect.

hanzi: 婚礼 热闹 极了 。
pinyin: Hūnlǐ rènao jíle.
english: The wedding was very lively.

hanzi: 一点 声音 都 没有 ，安静 极了 。
pinyin: Yīdiǎn shēngyīn dōu méiyǒu, ānjìng jíle.
english: There is no sound at all. It's extremely quiet.

hanzi: 昨天 的 派对 无聊 极了 !
pinyin: Zuótiān de pàiduì wúliáo jíle!
english: Yesterday's party was so boring!

hanzi: 他 那么 生气 ，我们 都 害怕 极了 。
pinyin: Tā nàme shēngqì, wǒmen dōu hàipà jíle.
english: He was so angry. We were all so scared.

hanzi: 高考 那 天 ，我 紧张 极了 。
pinyin: Gāokǎo nà tiān, wǒ jǐnzhāng jíle.
english: I was super nervous the day I took the college entrance examination.

hanzi: 这 件 事 让 我们 都 尴尬 极了 。
pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì ràng wǒmen dōu gāngà jíle.
english: This incident made us all extremely embarrassed.

hanzi: 那个 男孩 讨厌 极了 !
pinyin: Nàge nánhái tǎoyàn jíle!
english: That boy is super annoying!

hanzi: 最近 不 怎么 忙 。
pinyin: Zuìjìn bù zěnme máng.
english: It hasn't been very busy lately.

hanzi: 这里 的 冬天 不 怎么 冷 。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān bù zěnme lěng.
english: It's not very cold here in winter.

hanzi: 他们 好像 不 怎么 高兴 。
pinyin: Tāmen hǎoxiàng bù zěnme gāoxìng.
english: They don't seem to be very happy.

hanzi: 这个 学生 不 怎么 努力 。
pinyin: Zhège xuéshēng bù zěnme nǔlì.
english: This student isn't very hard-working.

hanzi: 那 家 餐厅 不 怎么 干净 。
pinyin: Nà jiā cāntīng bù zěnme gānjìng.
english: That restaurant isn't very clean.

hanzi: 这个 老师 不 怎么 专业 。
pinyin: Zhège lǎoshī bù zěnme zhuānyè.
english: This teacher isn't very professional.

hanzi: 你 是 不 是 昨天 睡 得 不 怎么 好 ？
pinyin: Nǐ shì bu shì zuótiān shuì de bù zěnme hǎo?
english: Did you not sleep very well last night?

hanzi: 我 不 怎么 喜欢 咖啡 。
pinyin: Wǒ bù zěnme xǐhuan kāfēi.
english: I'm not very into coffee.

hanzi: 他 跟 他 父母 长 得 不 怎么 像 。
pinyin: Tā gēn tā fùmǔ zhǎng de bù zěnme xiàng.
english: He and his parents don't look very much alike.

hanzi: 他 去 美国 一 年 多 了 ，不过 不 怎么 想家 。
pinyin: Tā qù Měiguó yì nián duō le, búguò bù zěnme xiǎngjiā.
english: He's been in the USA for more than one year, but he's not very homesick.

hanzi: 我们 全 家 都 去 过 北京 。
pinyin: Wǒmen quán jiā dōu qù guo Běijīng.
english: Our entire family has been to Beijing.

hanzi: 全 公司 的 人 都 不 喜欢 新 老板 。
pinyin: Quán gōngsī de rén dōu bù xǐhuan xīn lǎobǎn.
english: The whole company doesn't like the new boss.

hanzi: 运动 完 以后 我 全 身 都 是 汗 。
pinyin: Yùndòng wán yǐhòu wǒ quán shēn dōu shì hàn.
english: My whole body was sweaty after I finished exercising.

hanzi: 全 校 都 放假 了 。
pinyin: Quán xiào dōu fàngjià le.
english: The whole school is on break.

hanzi: 这个 地方 全 年 都 很 热 。
pinyin: Zhège dìfang quán nián dōu hěn rè.
english: This place is hot all year round.

hanzi: 大家 全 都 到 了。
pinyin: Dàjiā quán dōu dào le.
english: Everybody has arrived.

hanzi: 奶奶 的 头发 全 都 白 了。
pinyin: Nǎinai de tóufà quán dōu bái le.
english: All of grandma's hair has turned white.

hanzi: 我 妈妈 做 的 菜 全 都 好吃 。
pinyin: Wǒ māma zuò de cài quán dōu hǎochī.
english: All of the food that my mother makes is tasty.

hanzi: 作业 全 都 做 完 了 吗 ？
pinyin: Zuòyè quán dōu zuò wán le ma?
english: Have you finished all your homework?

hanzi: 你 全 都 拿 走 吧。
pinyin: Nǐ quán dōu názǒu ba.
english: Take them all.

hanzi: 他们 全 都 没 去 。
pinyin: Tāmen quán dōu méi qù.
english: None of them went.

hanzi: 这个 周末 我们 全 都 不 在 家 。
pinyin: Zhège zhōumò wǒmen quán dōu bú zài jiā.
english: None of us will be home this weekend.

hanzi: 你们 全 都 不 怕 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen quán dōu bú pà ma?
english: Are none of you afraid?

hanzi: 这些 菜 全 都 没 熟 。
pinyin: Zhèxiē cài quán dōu méi shú.
english: None of these dishes is fully cooked.

hanzi: 他 的 话 我 全 都 不 相信 。
pinyin: Tā de huà wǒ quán dōu bù xiāngxìn.
english: I don't believe anything he says.

hanzi: 他 说 得 有 道理 ，但 我 不 全 都 同意 。
pinyin: Tā shuō de yǒu dàolǐ, dàn wǒ bù quán dōu tóngyì.
english: He has a point, but I don't agree with all of it.

hanzi: 菜 太 多 了 ，我们 没 全 都 吃完 。
pinyin: Cài tài duō le, wǒmen méi quán dōu chī wán.
english: The food was too much. We didn't finish eating it all.

hanzi: 昨天 作业 太 多 了 ，我 没 全 都 做完 。
pinyin: Zuótiān zuòyè tài duō le, wǒ méi quán dōu zuò wán.
english: I had too much homework yesterday. I didn't finish doing it all.

hanzi: 我 的 家人 没 全 都 来 参加 我 的 婚礼 。
pinyin: Wǒ de jiārén méi quán dōu lái cānjiā wǒ de hūnlǐ.
english: Not all of my family came to my wedding.

hanzi: 你 说 得 太 快 了 ， 我 没 全 都 记 下来 。
pinyin: Nǐ shuō de tài kuài le, wǒ méi quán dōu jì xiàlái.
english: You spoke too fast. I didn't write down all of what you said.

hanzi: 你 的 脸 红 红 的 。
pinyin: Nǐ de liǎn hóng hóng de.
english: Your face is red.

hanzi: 宝宝 的 眼睛 大 大 的 。
pinyin: Bǎobao de yǎnjīng dà dà de.
english: The baby's eyes are big.

hanzi: 今晚 的 月亮 圆 圆 的 。
pinyin: Jīnwǎn de yuèliàng yuán yuán de.
english: The moon is round tonight.

hanzi: 她 爸爸 高 高 胖 胖 的 。
pinyin: Tā bàba gāo gāo pàng pàng de.
english: Her father is tall and fat.

hanzi: 我 妹妹 瘦 瘦 小 小 的 。
pinyin: Wǒ mèimei shòu shòu xiǎo xiǎo de.
english: My little sister is thin and small.

hanzi: 高兴 → 高高兴兴
pinyin: gāoxìng ￫ gāogāo-xìngxìng
english: happy

hanzi: 热闹 → 热热闹闹
pinyin: rènao ￫ rèrè-nāonāo
english: noisy, boisterous

hanzi: 漂亮 → 漂漂亮亮
pinyin: piàoliang ￫ piàopiào-liāngliāng
english: pretty

hanzi: 舒服 → 舒舒服服
pinyin: shūfu ￫ shūshū-fūfū
english: comfortable

hanzi: 安静 → 安安静静
pinyin: ānjìng ￫ ānān-jìngjìng
english: quiet and still

hanzi: 我们 清清楚楚 地 看到 他 跟 一 个 胖 胖 的 男人 上 车 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen qīngqīng-chǔchǔ de kàndào tā gēn yīgè pàng pàng de nánrén shàngchē le.
english: We clearly saw him get in the car with a fat man.

hanzi: 我 真 想 舒舒服服 地 躺 在 沙发 上 看 电视 。
pinyin: Wǒ zhēn xiǎng shūshū-fūfū de tǎng zài shāfā shàng kàn diànshì.
english: I'd really like to comfortably lie on the couch and watch TV.

hanzi: 你 妈妈 辛辛苦苦 地 做 了 两 个 小时 的 饭，你 怎么 不 吃 ？
pinyin: Nǐ māma xīnxīn-kǔkǔ de zuò le liǎng gè xiǎoshí de fàn, nǐ zěnme bù chī?
english: Your mother labored over this meal for two hours, and you aren't going to eat it?

hanzi: 妹妹 快 过 生日 了 ，我 打算 给 她 办 一 个 生日 派对 ，热闹 热闹 。
pinyin: Mèimei kuài guò shēngrì le, wǒ dǎsuàn gěi tā bàn yī gè shēngrì pàiduì, rènao rènao.
english: My little sister's birthday is coming and I plan to throw her a birthday party and have a blast.

hanzi: 来 ，喝 点 酒 ，高兴 高兴 。
pinyin: Lái, hē diǎn jiǔ, gāoxìng gāoxìng.
english: Come on, have a little wine and enjoy yourself.

hanzi: 到 这里 来 凉快 凉快 。
pinyin: Dào zhèlǐ lái liángkuai liángkuai.
english: Come over here and cool off.

hanzi: 我 想 去 外面 走走 ，安静  一下 。
pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù wàimiàn zǒuzou, ānjìng yīxià.
english: I'd like to take a walk outside, get some quiet time.

hanzi: 想 不 想 去 做 个 按摩 ，放松 一下 。
pinyin: Xiǎng bu xiǎng qù zuò gè ànmó, fàngsōng yīxià.
english: Would you like to go get a massage and unwind?

hanzi: 你 要 努力 地 学习 。
pinyin: Nǐ yào nǔlì de xuéxí.
english: You must study hard.

hanzi: 雨天 地 滑 ，慢 慢 地 走 。
pinyin: Yǔtiān dì huá, màn màn de zǒu.
english: The floor is very slippery on rainy days. Walk slowly.

hanzi: 他 顺利 地 通过 考试 了。
pinyin: tā shùnlì de tōngguò kǎoshì le.
english: He passed the exam successfully.

hanzi: 他 认真 地 对 我 说 ：“我 喜欢 你 。“
pinyin: Tā rènzhēn de duì wǒ shuō: “wǒ xǐhuan nǐ.“
english: In all seriousness, he said to me: “I like you.“

hanzi: 他 热情 地 拥抱 了 我 。
pinyin: Tā rèqíng de yōngbào le wǒ.
english: He gave me a very warm embrace.

hanzi: 她 激动 地 对 我 说 “谢谢 ” 。
pinyin: Tā jīdòng de duì wǒ shuō “xièxie.“
english: She said “thank you“ to me excitedly.

hanzi: 老师 生气 地 看 着 我们 。
pinyin: Lǎoshī shēngqì de kàn zhe wǒmen.
english: The teacher is looking at us angrily.

hanzi: 孩子 们 开心 地 唱 了 起来 。
pinyin: Háizi men kāixīn de chàng le qǐlai.
english: The children started to sing happily.

hanzi: 大家 都 在 教室 里 安安静静 地 看书 。
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu zài jiàoshì lǐ ānān-jìngjìng de kàn shū.
english: Everybody is reading quietly in the classroom.

hanzi: 我 希望 你 快快乐乐 地 长大 。
pinyin: Wǒ xīwàng nǐ kuàikuài-lèlè de zhǎngdà.
english: I hope that you grow up happily.

hanzi: 我 正好 要 出去 ，垃圾 我 来 扔 吧 。
pinyin: Wǒ zhènghǎo yào chūqù, lājī wǒ lái rēng ba.
english: I'm just about to leave. I'll take out the trash.

hanzi: 你 来 了 ！我 正好 要 找 你 。
pinyin: Nǐ lái le! Wǒ zhènghǎo yào zhǎo nǐ.
english: You are here! I was just looking for you.

hanzi: 他 正好 问 了 我 想 问 的 问题 。
pinyin: Tā zhènghǎo wèn le wǒ xiǎng wèn de wèntí.
english: He happened to ask the question that I wanted to ask.

hanzi: 我 正好 也 在 这里 实习 。
pinyin: Wǒ zhènghǎo yě zài zhèlǐ shíxí.
english: I happen to be interning here too.

hanzi: 正好 你们 都 是 单身 。
pinyin: Zhènghǎo nǐmen dōu shì dānshēn.
english: You both happen to be single.

hanzi: 我 明天 见 他 ，正好 可以 问问 他 这 件 事 。
pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān jiàn tā, zhènghǎo kěyǐ wènwen tā zhè jiàn shì.
english: I'm going to meet with him tomorrow. I can just ask him about this matter.

hanzi: 我们 正好 也 要 去 那儿 ，一起 走 吧 。
pinyin: Wǒmen zhènghǎo yě yào qù nàr, yīqǐ zǒu ba.
english: We just happen to be going there. Let's go together.

hanzi: 我 敲 门 的 时候 ，他 正好 出门 。
pinyin: Wǒ qiāo mén de shíhou, tā zhènghǎo chūmén.
english: He just happened to be leaving the house while I was knocking at the door.

hanzi: 这 件 衣服 的 大 小 正好 。
pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu de dà xiǎo zhènghǎo.
english: The size of these clothes is just right.

hanzi: 水温 正好，不 冷 也 不 热 。
pinyin: Shuǐwēn zhènghǎo, bù lěng yě bù rè.
english: The temperature of the water is perfect, not too cold, not too hot.

hanzi: 这 件 事情 我 还 在 考虑 。
pinyin: Zhè jiàn shìqing wǒ hái zài kǎolǜ.
english: I am still thinking over this matter.

hanzi: 已经 中午 了 ，他 还 在 睡 ？
pinyin: Yǐjīng zhōngwǔ le, tā hái zài shuì?
english: It's already noon and he's still sleeping?

hanzi: 她 还 在 生气 吗 ？
pinyin: Tā hái zài shēngqì ma?
english: Is she still mad?

hanzi: 你 怎么 还 在 用 那个 旧 手机 ？
pinyin: Nǐ zěnme hái zài yòng nàge jiù shǒujī?
english: How come you're still using that old cell phone?

hanzi: 你 还 在 玩 游戏 ？明天 不是 有 考试 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ hái zài wán yóuxì? Míngtiān bù shì yǒu kǎoshì ma?
english: You're still playing video games? Don't you have an exam tomorrow?

hanzi: 我 让 他 不要 买 ，他 还是 买 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ ràng tā bùyào mǎi, tā háishì mǎi le.
english: I told him not to buy it, but he still bought it.

hanzi: 他 不 想 离婚 ，但是 最后 还是 离婚 了 。
pinyin: Tā bù xiǎng líhūn, dànshì zuìhòu háishì líhūn le.
english: He didn't want to get divorced, but in the end he still ended up getting divorced.

hanzi: 父母 不 同意 他 去 ，可是 他 还是 去 了。
pinyin: Fùmǔ bù tóngyì tā qù, kěshì tā háishì qù le.
english: His parents didn't agree to it, but he still went.

hanzi: 医生 不 让 她 喝酒 ，她 还是 喝 。
pinyin: Yīshēng bù ràng tā hējiǔ, tā háishì hē.
english: The doctor told her to stop drinking, but she still drinks.

hanzi: 老师 生病 了，但是 她 还是 来 上课 了。
pinyin: Lǎoshī shēngbìng le, dànshì tā háishì lái shàngkè le.
english: The teacher is sick, but she still come to class.

hanzi: 我们 等 了 半 个 小时 了 ，老师 还 没 到 。
pinyin: Wǒmen děng le bàn gè xiǎoshí le. Lǎoshī hái méi dào.
english: We've been waiting for half an hour, but the teacher still hasn't arrived.

hanzi: 电影 已经 开始 了 ，你 还 没 出门 ？
pinyin: Diànyǐng yǐjīng kāishǐ le, nǐ hái méi chūmén?
english: The movie has started already, and you still haven't left the house?

hanzi: 你 已经 四十 多 了 ，还 不 想 结婚 ？
pinyin: Nǐ yǐjīng sìshí duō le, hái bù xiǎng jiéhūn?
english: You're in your forties, and you still don't want to get married?

hanzi: 我 解释 了 这么 多 遍 ，你 还 不 懂 ？
pinyin: Wǒ jiěshì le zhème duō biàn, nǐ hái bù dǒng?
english: I've explained it so many times, and you still don't get it?

hanzi: 我 对 你 这么 好 ，你 还 不 高兴 ？
pinyin: Wǒ duì nǐ zhème hǎo, nǐ hái bù gāoxìng?
english: I treat you so well, but you're still not happy?

hanzi: 那个 人 就是 她 的 新 男朋友。
pinyin: Nàge rén jiùshì tā de xīn nánpéngyou.
english: That guy is her new boyfriend.

hanzi: 他 就是 你 要 找 的 人 。
pinyin: Tā jiùshì nǐ yào zhǎo de rén.
english: He's just the person that you're looking for.

hanzi: 我们 就是 他 的 家人 。
pinyin: Wǒmen jiùshì tā de jiārén.
english: We're his family.

hanzi: 你 就是 个 笨蛋！
pinyin: Nǐ jiùshì gè bèndàn!
english: A moron is precisely what you are!

hanzi: 他 就是 那个 骗子！
pinyin: Tā jiùshì nàge piànzi!
english: That con man is him!

hanzi: 他 不 去 旅游 就是 不 想 花钱 。
pinyin: Tā bù qù lǚyóu jiùshì bù xiǎng huāqián.
english: He didn't travel only because he doesn't want to spend the money.

hanzi: 你 不 参加 比赛 就是 怕 输 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ bù cānjiā bǐsài jiùshì pà shū ma?
english: You're not entering the competition just because you're afraid of losing?

hanzi: 他 这样 说 就是 不 喜欢 我 。
pinyin: Tā zhèyàng shuō jiùshì bù xǐhuan wǒ.
english: He said this only because he doesn't like me.

hanzi: 她 问 这么 多，就是 担心 你 。
pinyin: Tā wèn zhème duō, jiùshì dānxīn nǐ.
english: She asked so many questions only because she's worried about you.

hanzi: 她 就是 漂亮 ，没 别的 优势 。
pinyin: Tā jiùshì piàoliang, méi biéde yōushì.
english: She's just pretty; she doesn't have any other strengths.

hanzi: 我 就 要 去！
pinyin: Wǒ jiù yào qù!
english: I just want to go!

hanzi: 我 就是 喜欢 他。
pinyin: Wǒ jiù shì  xǐhuan tā.
english: I just like him.

hanzi: 我 就 不 告诉 你 。
pinyin: Wǒ jiù bù gàosu nǐ.
english: I'm just not going to tell you.

hanzi: 我 父母 就是 不 让 我 一个人 去 。
pinyin: Wǒ fùmǔ jiùshì bù ràng wǒ yīgèrén qù.
english: My parents simply won't let me go alone.

hanzi: 这个 学生 就是不 听 老师 的 话 。
pinyin: Zhège xuéshēng jiùshì bù tīng lǎoshī de huà.
english: The student just wouldn't listen to his teacher.

hanzi: 问 我 干吗 ？我 又 不 知道 。
pinyin: Wèn wǒ gànmá? Wǒ yòu bù zhīdào.
english: Why ask me? I definitely don't know.

hanzi: 这些 菜 又 没 坏 ，为什么 要 扔 ？
pinyin: Zhèxiē cài yòu méi huài, wèishénme yào rēng?
english: These dishes haven't gone bad. Why would you throw them away?

hanzi: 不要 生气 ，我 又 不 是 故意 的 。
pinyin: Bùyào shēngqì, wǒ yòu bù shì gùyì de.
english: Don't be mad.It really wasn't on purpose.

hanzi: 今天 又 不 热 ，开 空调 干吗 ？
pinyin: Jīntiān yòu bù rè, kāi kōngtiáo gànmá?
english: It's not hot today. Why turn on the air conditioner?

hanzi: 明天 又 不 上班 ，那么 早 起床 干吗 ？
pinyin: Míngtiān yòu bù shàngbān, nàme zǎo qǐchuáng gànmá?
english: You don't work tomorrow. Why get up so early?

hanzi: 你 现在 又 不 忙 ，来 帮 我 一下 。
pinyin: Nǐ xiànzài yòu bù máng, lái bāng wǒ yīxià.
english: You're not busy now. Come and help me.

hanzi: 我 又 没 吃 过 ，怎么 知道 好 不 好吃 ？
pinyin: Wǒ yòu méi chī guo, zěnme zhīdào hǎo bu hǎochī?
english: I haven't eaten it. How would I know if it is tasty or not?

hanzi: 孩子 又 没 做错 ，打 他 干吗 ？
pinyin: Háizi yòu méi zuò cuò, dǎ tā gànmá?
english: The child didn't do anything wrong. Why are you spanking him?

hanzi: 又 没 下 雨 ，带 伞 干吗 ？
pinyin: Yòu méi xiàyǔ, dài sǎn gànmá?
english: It's not raining. Why are you bringing the umbrella?

hanzi: 又 不 关 你 的 事 ，问 那么 多 干 吗？
pinyin: Yòu bù guān nǐ de shì, wèn nàme duō gànmá?
english: It's none of your business. Why all the questions?

hanzi: 就 要 下雨 了  。
pinyin: Jiù yào xiàyǔ le.
english: It's about to rain.

hanzi: 他们 就 要 结婚 了 。
pinyin: Tāmen jiù yào jiéhūn le.
english: They are about to get married.

hanzi: 我 就 要 出国 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ jiù yào chūguó le.
english: I'm about to go abroad.

hanzi: 宝宝 就 要 一岁 了 。
pinyin: Bǎobao jiù yào yī suì le.
english: The baby is about to be one year old.

hanzi: 就 要 下课 了 ，还有 别的 问题 吗 ？
pinyin: Jiù yào xiàkè le, hái yǒu bié de wèntí ma?
english: The class is almost over. Are there any other questions?

hanzi: 还有 十 分钟 我 就 下班 了 。
pinyin: Háiyǒu shí fēnzhōng wǒ jiù xiàbān le.
english: I get off work in 10 minutes.

hanzi: 还有 两 个 星期 我们 就 要 考试 了 。
pinyin: Háiyǒu liǎng gè xīngqí wǒmen jiù yào kǎoshì le.
english: We're just two weeks away from the exam date.

hanzi: 还有 一 个 月 就 要 过年 了 。
pinyin: Háiyǒu yī gè yuè jiù yào guònián le.
english: It will be Chinese New Year in another month.

hanzi: 还有 半 个 小时 飞机 就 起飞 了 。
pinyin: Háiyǒu bàn gè xiǎoshí fēijī jiù qǐfēi le.
english: The plane takes off in half an hour.

hanzi: 还有 五 天 就 要 放假 了 。
pinyin: Háiyǒu wǔ tiān jiù yào fàngjià le.
english: I go on vacation in 5 days.

hanzi: 我们 明年 再 来 。
pinyin: Wǒmen míngnián zài lái.
english: We'll come again next year.

hanzi: 再 试 一下 。
pinyin: Zài shì yīxià.
english: Try it again.

hanzi: 你 可以 再 说 一 遍 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ zài shuō yī biàn ma?
english: Can you please say it again?

hanzi: 这 本 书 我 要 再 看 一 遍 。
pinyin: Zhè běn shū wǒ yào zài kàn yī biàn.
english: I want to read this book again.

hanzi: 你 应该 再 复习 一 遍 。
pinyin: Nǐ yīnggāi zài fùxí yī biàn.
english: You should review it again.

hanzi: 再 吃 一点 。
pinyin: Zài chī yīdiǎn.
english: Eat some more.

hanzi: 再 点 几个 菜 吧 。
pinyin: Zài diǎn jǐ gè cài ba.
english: Let's order some more dishes.

hanzi: 服务员 ，再 来 两 瓶 啤酒 。
pinyin: Fúwùyuán, zài lái liǎng píng píjiǔ.
english: Waiter, two more bottles of beer, please.

hanzi: 再 给 我 三天 时间 。
pinyin: Zài gěi wǒ sān tiān shíjiān.
english: Give me another three days.

hanzi: 我 能 不 能 再 拿 两 个 ？
pinyin: Wǒ néng bu néng zài ná liǎng gè?
english: Can I take two more?

hanzi: 再 找找 。
pinyin: Zài zhǎozhao.
english: Keep looking.

hanzi: 你 再 问问 。
pinyin: Nǐ zài wènwen.
english: Keep asking.

hanzi: 别 急 ，再 想想 。
pinyin: Bié jí, zài xiǎngxiang.
english: Don't worry. Keep thinking.

hanzi: 再 聊 一会儿 。
pinyin: Zài liáo yīhuǐr.
english: Keep talking for a little bit.

hanzi: 再 等 一会儿 。
pinyin: Zài děng yīhuǐr.
english: Wait a little longer.

hanzi: 又 下雨 了 ！
pinyin: Yòu xiàyǔ le!
english: It rained again!

hanzi: 你 又 迟到 了 。
pinyin: Nǐ yòu chídào le.
english: You're late again.

hanzi: 宝宝 又 哭 了 。
pinyin: Bǎobao yòu kū le.
english: The baby is crying again.

hanzi: 我 又  忘 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ yòu wàng le.
english: I forgot again.

hanzi: 他 又 没 来 上课 。
pinyin: Tā yòu méi lái shàngkè.
english: He didn't come to class again.

hanzi: 你们 又 不 付钱 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen yòu bù fùqián?
english: You're not paying again?

hanzi: 你 又 不 参加 ？
pinyin: Nǐ yòu bù cānjiā?
english: You are not going to participate again?

hanzi: 对不起 ，我 又 没 带 书 。
pinyin: Duìbuqǐ, wǒ yòu méi dài shū.
english: Sorry, I forgot to bring the book again.

hanzi: 今天 又 要 加班 了 ！
pinyin: Jīntiān yòu yào jiābān le!
english: We've got to work overtime again today!

hanzi: 老板 请客 ，又 可以 吃 大餐 了 ！
pinyin: Lǎobǎn qǐngkè, yòu kěyǐ chī dàcān le!
english: The boss is going to treat us. We can have a big meal again!

hanzi: 快 过年 了 ，我们 又 能 拿 红包 了 ！
pinyin: Kuài guònián le, wǒmen yòu néng ná hóngbāo le!
english: It's almost Chinese New Year. We can get our red packets [of money] again!

hanzi: 你 原来 的 发型 也 很 可爱 。
pinyin: Nǐ yuánlái de fàxíng yě hěn kě'ài.
english: Your original hairstyle was also very cute.

hanzi: 这 件 衣服 原来 的 价格 是 999 块 。
pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu yuánlái de jiàgé shì jiǔbǎi jiǔshí-jiǔ kuài.
english: The original price of this piece of clothing was 999 RMB.

hanzi: 她们 原来 只是 邻居 ，现在 是 很好 的 朋友 。
pinyin: Tāmen yuánlái zhǐ shì línjū, xiànzài shì hěn hǎo de péngyou.
english: Originally they were just neighbors. Now they're very good friends.

hanzi: 我们 原来 住 在 浦东 ，几 个 月 以前 搬 到 了 这里 。
pinyin: Wǒmen yuánlái zhù zài Pǔdōng, jǐ gè yuè yǐqián bān dào le zhèlǐ.
english: Originally we lived in Pudong. We moved here a few months ago.

hanzi: 原来 她 是 他 的 中文 老师，现在 是 他 老婆 。
pinyin: Yuánlái tā shì tā de Zhōngwén lǎoshī, xiànzài shì tā lǎopo.
english: She was originally his Chinese teacher. She is now his wife.

hanzi: 原来 是 你 ！
pinyin: Yuánlái shì nǐ!
english: So it was you all along!

hanzi: 原来 你们 认识 ！
pinyin: Yuánlái nǐmen rènshi!
english: So you both knew each other this whole time!

hanzi: 原来 是 这样 ！
pinyin: Yuánlái shì zhèyàng!
english: Oh, so it's like that!

hanzi: 原来 你 这么 有钱！
pinyin: Yuánlái nǐ zhème yǒuqián!
english: It turns out you are so rich!

hanzi: 原来 你 在 骗 我 ！ 我 怎么 那么 傻 ？
pinyin: Yuánlái nǐ zài piàn wǒ! Wǒ zěnme nàme shǎ?
english: You have been tricking me all along. How could I be so stupid?

hanzi: 天气 一下子 变 冷 了 。
pinyin: Tiānqì yīxiàzi biàn lěng le.
english: The weather suddenly got cold.

hanzi: 他 一下子 吃 了 三 碗 米饭 。
pinyin: Tā yīxiàzi chī le sān wǎn mǐfàn.
english: He ate three bowls of rice all at once.

hanzi: 她 下楼 的时候 一下子 摔倒 了 。
pinyin: Tā xiàlóu de shíhou yīxiàzi shuāidǎo le.
english: As she went down the stairs, she suddenly fell.

hanzi: 我们 说话 的 时候 ，她 一下子 哭 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen shuōhuà de shíhou, tā yīxiàzi kū le.
english: She burst into tears when we were talking.

hanzi: 她 上 个 月 一下子 瘦 了 很 多 。
pinyin: Tā shàng gè yuè yīxiàzi shòu le hěn duō.
english: Last month, she lost a lot of weight all at once.

hanzi: 老师 进来 以后 ，大家 一下子 就 安静 了 。
pinyin: Lǎoshī jìnlái yǐhòu, dàjiā yīxiàzi jiù ānjìng le.
english: Everyone became silent after the teacher came in.

hanzi: 听 他 说 完 ，我 一下子 就 明白 了 。
pinyin: Tīng tā shuō wán, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù míngbai le.
english: After hearing him out, I understood everything all at once.

hanzi: 他 是 最 高 的 ，我 一下子 就 看到 他 了 。
pinyin: Tā shì zuì gāo de, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù kàndào tā le.
english: He is the tallest. I spotted him right away.

hanzi: 拍 完 那 部 电影 ，他 一下子 就 出名 了 。
pinyin: Pāi wán nà bù diànyǐng, tā yīxiàzi jiù chūmíng le.
english: He became very famous soon after that movie came out.

hanzi: 看到 那 张 照片 ，我 一下子 就 想 起来 了 。
pinyin: Kàndào nà zhāng zhàopiàn, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù xiǎng qǐlái le.
english: It all came back to me when I saw that picture.

hanzi: 车 差点 撞到 我 。
pinyin: Chē chàdiǎn zhuàngdào wǒ.
english: The car almost hit me.

hanzi: 我们 差点 相信 他 。
pinyin: Wǒmen chàdiǎn xiāngxìn tā.
english: We almost believed him.

hanzi: 他们 差点 打 起来 。
pinyin: Tāmen chàdiǎn dǎ qǐlái.
english: They almost started a fight.

hanzi: 我 差点 忘 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ chàdiǎn wàng le.
english: I almost forgot.

hanzi: 我 今天 差点 迟到 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān chàdiǎn chídào le.
english: I was almost late today.

hanzi: 她 差点 疯 了 。
pinyin: Tā chàdiǎn fēng le.
english: She almost went crazy.

hanzi: 他 差点 就 死 了 。
pinyin: Tā chàdiǎn jiù sǐ le.
english: He almost died.

hanzi: 菜 差点 糊 了 。
pinyin: Cài chàdiǎn hú le.
english: The food was almost burned.

hanzi: 我们 队 差点 输 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen duì chàdiǎn  shū le.
english: Our team almost lost.

hanzi: 我 差点 就 打 他 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ chàdiǎn jiù dǎ tā le.
english: I almost hit him.

hanzi: 都 九点 了 ，快点 起床 ！
pinyin: Dōu jiǔ diǎn le, kuài diǎn qǐchuáng!
english: It's already nine o'clock. Get out of bed!

hanzi: 都 十二 点 了 ，你 还 不 睡 ？
pinyin: Dōu shí'èr diǎn le, nǐ hái bù shuì?
english: It's already 12 o'clock. Aren't you going to bed?

hanzi: 都 二十一 世纪 了 ，你 还 这么 想 ？
pinyin: Dōu èrshí-yī shìjì le, nǐ hái zhème xiǎng?
english: It's already the 21st century and you still think this way?

hanzi: 都 一 个 小时 了 ，他 还 在 厕所 里 。
pinyin: Dōu yī gè xiǎoshí le, tā hái zài cèsuǒ lǐ.
english: It's already been an hour, and he's still in the bathroom.

hanzi: 都 一 个 星期 了 ，还在 下雨 。
pinyin: Dōu yī gè xīngqī le, hái zài xiàyǔ.
english: It's been a week and it's still raining.

hanzi: 饭 都 凉 了 ，快 吃 吧 。
pinyin: Fàn dōu liáng le, kuài chī ba.
english: The food is cold already. Let's eat.

hanzi: 牛奶 都 坏 了 ，扔掉 吧 。
pinyin: Niúnǎi dōu huài le, rēngdiào ba.
english: The milk's gone bad. Throw it out.

hanzi: 我 都 说 了 三 遍 了 。别 烦 我 ！
pinyin: Wǒ dōu shuō le sān biàn le. Bié fán wǒ!
english: I've said it three times already. Leave me alone!

hanzi: 这个 电影 你 都 看 过 了 ，看 别的 吧 。
pinyin: Zhège diànyǐng nǐ dōu kàn guo le, kàn biéde ba.
english: You've seen this movie already. Let's watch something else.

hanzi: 他 都 道歉 了 ，你 别 生气 了。
pinyin: Tā dōu dàoqiàn le, nǐ bié shēngqì le.
english: He already apologized. Stop being so mad at him.

hanzi: 他 从来 都 这样 。
pinyin: Tā cónglái dōu zhèyàng.
english: He's always like this.

hanzi: 她 从来 都 这么 晚 睡 。
pinyin: Tā cónglái dōu zhème wǎn shuì.
english: She's always gone to bed so late.

hanzi: 他 说话 从来 都 很 大声 。
pinyin: Tā shuōhuà cónglái dōu hěn dàshēng.
english: He's always spoken very loudly.

hanzi: 我们 学校 的 学生 从来 都 只 能 穿 校服 。
pinyin: Wǒmen xuéxiào de xuéshēng cónglái dōu zhǐ néng chuān xiàofú.
english: Students in our school can only wear school uniforms.

hanzi: 成功 从来 都 要 靠 自己 努力 。
pinyin: Chénggōng cónglái dōu yào kào zìjǐ nǔlì.
english: Success always depends on working hard by oneself.

hanzi: 我们 下棋 ，从来 都是 他 赢 。
pinyin: Wǒmen xiàqí, cónglái dōushì   tā yíng.
english: He always wins when we play chess.

hanzi: 她 买 衣服 从来 都是 只 买 名牌 。
pinyin: Tā mǎi yīfu cónglái dōushì  zhǐ mǎi míngpái.
english: She always buys brand-name clothes when she goes shopping.

hanzi: 我 从来 都是 一个人 住 ，已经 习惯 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ cónglái dōushì  yīgèrén zhù, yǐjīng xíguàn le.
english: I've always lived alone; I'm used to it already.

hanzi: 她 穿 得 很 少 ，结果 感冒 了 。
pinyin: Tā chuān de hěn shǎo, jiéguǒ gǎnmào le.
english: She didn't dress warmly enough, and as a result, she caught a cold.

hanzi: 我 太 紧张 了 ，结果 说 错 了 很 多 。
pinyin: Wǒ tài jǐnzhāng le, jiéguǒ shuō cuò le hěn duō.
english: I was too nervous. As a result, I misspoke a lot.

hanzi: 他 开 得 太 快 了 ，结果 撞到 了 一 个 人 。
pinyin: Tā kāi de tài kuài le, jiéguǒ zhuàngdào le yī gè rén.
english: He drove too fast. As a result, he hit someone.

hanzi: 他 没 好好 复习，结果 考试 没 考 好 。
pinyin: Tā méi hǎohǎo fùxí, jiéguǒ kǎoshì méi kǎo hǎo.
english: He didn't review well. As a result, he didn't do well in the exam.

hanzi: 他 总是 迟到 ，结果 老板 炒 了 他 的 鱿鱼 。
pinyin: Tā zǒngshì chídào, jiéguǒ lǎobǎn chǎo le tā de yóuyú.
english: He's always late for work. As a result, his boss fired him.

hanzi: 我 去 机场 接 他 ，结果 没 接到 他 。
pinyin: Wǒ qù jīchǎng jiē tā, jiéguǒ méi jiēdào tā.
english: I went to the airport to pick him up. But in the end, I didn't find him there.

hanzi: 我 跟 朋友 打赌 ，结果 我 输 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ gēn péngyou dǎdǔ, jiéguǒ wǒ shū le.
english: I made a bet with a friend. I lost in the end.

hanzi: 我 昨天 跟 朋友 去 喝酒 ，结果 喝醉 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān gēn péngyou qù hējiǔ, jiéguǒ hēzuì le.
english: I went to have a drink with my friends yesterday. I ended up getting drunk.

hanzi: 他 吃 了 很 多 药 ，结果 都 没有 用 。
pinyin: Tā chī le hěn duō yào, jiéguǒ dōu méiyǒu yòng.
english: He took a lot of pills. None of them worked in the end.

hanzi: 我 点 的 是 牛肉 汉堡 ，结果  服务员 给 了 我 一 个 鸡肉 的 。
pinyin: Wǒ diǎn de shì niúròu hànbǎo, jiéguǒ fúwùyuán gěi le wǒ yī gè jīròu de.
english: I ordered a burger. The waiter gave me a chicken sandwich instead.

hanzi: 他们 已经 两 天 没 吃 东西 了 。
pinyin: Tāmen yǐjīng liǎng tiān méi chī dōngxi le.
english: They haven't eating anything for two days already.

hanzi: 我们 已经 十 年 没 见 了。
pinyin: Wǒmen yǐjīng shí nián méi jiàn le.
english: We haven't seen each other for ten years already.

hanzi: 他 已经 一 个 星期 没 洗澡 了 。
pinyin: Tā yǐjīng yī gè xīngqī méi xǐzǎo le.
english: He has already gone a whole week without showering.

hanzi: 你 多 长 时间 没 刮 胡子 了 ？
pinyin: Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān méi guā húzi le?
english: How long has it been since you last shaved?

hanzi: 她 半 个 月 没 出门 了 。
pinyin: Tā bàn gè yuè méi chūmén le.
english: It's been half a month since she's left the house.

hanzi: 你们 多久 没 回家 了 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen duōjiǔ méi huíjiā le?
english: How long has it been since you returned home?

hanzi: 你 多久 没 休假 了 ？
pinyin: Nǐ duōjiǔ méi xiūjià le?
english: How long has it been since your last vacation?

hanzi: 买 吧 ，你 已经 一 年 多 没 买 新 衣服 了 。
pinyin: Mǎi ba, nǐ yǐjīng yī nián duō méi mǎi xīn yīfu le.
english: Just buy it. It's been more than one year since you last bought new clothes.

hanzi: 你 好像 很久 没 这么 开心 了 。
pinyin: Nǐ hǎoxiàng hěnjiǔ méi zhème kāixīn le.
english: It seems like it's been a long time since you were this happy.

hanzi: 我 已经 十 年 没 来 中国 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng shí nián méi lái Zhōngguó le.
english: It's been 10 years since I came to China last.

hanzi: 我 上次 来 中国 是 2010 年 。
pinyin: Wǒ shàngcì lái Zhōngguó shì èr-líng-yī-líng nián.
english: The last time I came to China was 2010.

hanzi: 互相 帮助
pinyin: hùxiāng bāngzhù
english: Help each other

hanzi: 互相 了解
pinyin: hùxiāng liǎojiě
english: Know each other

hanzi: 互相 伤害
pinyin: hùxiāng shānghài
english: Hurt each other

hanzi: 互相 尊重
pinyin: hùxiāng zūnzhòng
english: Respect each other

hanzi: 互相 支持
pinyin: hùxiāng zhīchí
english: Support each other

hanzi: 互相 鼓励
pinyin: hùxiāng gǔlì
english: Encourage each other

hanzi: 互相 影响
pinyin: hùxiāng yǐngxiǎng
english: Influence each other

hanzi: 互相 利用
pinyin: hùxiāng lìyòng
english: Use each other

hanzi: 我 马上 就 来 。
pinyin: Wǒ mǎshàng jiù lái.
english: I'll be there in a second.

hanzi: 米饭 二十 分钟 就 好 。
pinyin: Mǐfàn èrshí fēnzhōng jiù hǎo.
english: The rice will be ready in 20 minutes.

hanzi: 你们 现在 就 出门 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen xiànzài jiù chūmén ma?
english: Are you leaving the house right now?

hanzi: 他们 一会儿 就 到 。
pinyin: Tāmen yīhuìr jiù dào.
english: They will be here in a few minutes.

hanzi: 老板 明天 就 回来 。
pinyin: Lǎobǎn míngtiān jiù huílái.
english: The boss will be back tomorrow.

hanzi: 我们 九点 上课 ，他 八点 就 来 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen jiǔ diǎn shàngkè, tā bā diǎn jiù lái le.
english: We have class at nine, but he came in at eight.

hanzi: 飞机 十点 起飞 ，他 六点 就 到 机场 了 。
pinyin: Fēijī shí diǎn qǐfēi, tā liù diǎn jiù dào jīchǎng le.
english: The plane takes off at ten o'clock, but he arrived at the airport at six.

hanzi: 我 昨晚 八 点 半 就 睡觉 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ zuówǎn  bā diǎn bàn jiù  shuìjiào le.
english: I went to bed at eight thirty last night.

hanzi: 她 十八 岁 就 大学 毕业 了 。
pinyin: Tā shíbā suì jiù dàxué bìyè le.
english: She graduated from college when she was only 18 years old.

hanzi: 你 一 个 晚上 就 看 完 了 ？
pinyin: Nǐ yī gè wǎnshang jiù kàn wán le?
english: It only took you just one night to finish reading it?

hanzi: 他 十 分钟 就 做完 了 。
pinyin: Tā shí fēnzhōng jiù zuò wán le.
english: It only took him ten minutes to finish doing it.

hanzi: 我 早就 知道 了 ！
pinyin: Wǒ zǎo jiù zhīdào le!
english: I knew that long ago!

hanzi: 她 早就 结婚 了 。
pinyin: Tā zǎo jiù jiéhūn le.
english: She got married a long time ago.

hanzi: 他们 早就 分手 了 。
pinyin: Tāmen zǎo jiù fēnshǒu le.
english: They broke up a long time ago.

hanzi: 我们 早就 毕业 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen zǎo jiù bìyè le.
english: We graduated a long time ago!

hanzi: 我 早就 跟 你 说 过 ，他 不 是 好人 。
pinyin: Wǒ zǎo jiù gēn nǐ shuō guo, tā bù shì hǎo rén.
english: I told you a long time ago that he's not a good guy.

hanzi: 我们 买 了 很 多 菜 ，够 吃 了 。
pinyin: Wǒmen mǎi le hěn duō cài, gòu chī le.
english: We bought a lot of food. It's enough for us to eat.

hanzi: 这些 纸 够 用 吗 ？
pinyin: Zhèxiē zhǐ gòu yòng ma?
english: Is this paper enough for us to use?

hanzi: 放心 吧 ，我 带 的 钱 够 花 。
pinyin: Fàngxīn ba, wǒ dài de qián gòu huā.
english: Don't worry. I've brought enough money to spend.

hanzi: 我 对 你 够 好 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ duì nǐ gòu hǎo le.
english: I've been good enough to you.

hanzi: 别 抱怨 了 ，你 够 幸运 了 。
pinyin: Bié bàoyuàn le, nǐ gòu xìngyùn le.
english: Stop complaining. You've been lucky enough.

hanzi: 他 觉得 他 女朋友 不 够 漂亮 。
pinyin: Tā juéde tā nǚpéngyou bù gòu piàoliang.
english: He thinks his girlfriend is not pretty enough.

hanzi: 你 说 得 不 够 清楚 。
pinyin: Nǐ shuō de bù gòu qīngchǔ.
english: You didn't speak clearly enough.

hanzi: 这些 菜 不 够 吃 ，再 点 几 个 菜 。
pinyin: Zhèxiē cài bù gòu chī, zài diǎn jǐ gè cài.
english: This food is not enough for us to eat. Let's order a few more dishes.

hanzi: 这里 太 小 了 ，不 够 坐 。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ tài xiǎo le, bù gòu zuò.
english: It's too cramped here. There's not enough room to sit.

hanzi: 你 的 包 太 小 了，这些 东西 肯定 不 够 放 。
pinyin: Nǐ de bāo tài xiǎo le, zhèxiē dōngxi kěndìng bù gòu fàng.
english: Your bag is too small. There's definitely not enough room to hold this stuff.

hanzi: 我 受 够 了 ！
pinyin: Wǒ shòu gòu le!
english: I've had enough!

hanzi: 天天 吃 外卖 ，我们 都 吃 够 了 。
pinyin: Tiāntiān chī wàimài, wǒmen dōu chī gòu le.
english: We eat take-out every day. We're sick of eating it.

hanzi: 你 玩 够 了 没有 ？
pinyin: Nǐ wán gòu le méiyǒu?
english: Are you done playing?

hanzi: 你 终于 到 了 ！
pinyin: Nǐ zhōngyú dào le!
english: You've finally arrived!

hanzi: 我们 终于 见面 了 ！
pinyin: Wǒmen zhōngyú jiànmiàn le!
english: We're finally meeting each other!

hanzi: 你们 终于 明白 了 。
pinyin: Nǐmen zhōngyú míngbai le.
english: You've finally understood.

hanzi: 作业 终于 做 完 了 ！
pinyin: Zuòyè zhōngyú zuò wán le!
english: I've finally finished my homework!

hanzi: 飞机 终于 起飞 了 ！
pinyin: Fēijī zhōngyú qǐfēi le!
english: The plane is finally taking off!

hanzi: 你们 终于 决定 了 。
pinyin: Nǐmen zhōngyú juédìng le.
english: You've finally decided.

hanzi: 饭 终于 做 好 了 。我 快 饿 死 了 。
pinyin: Fàn zhōngyú zuò hǎo le. Wǒ kuài è sǐ le.
english: Dinner is finally ready. I'm starving.

hanzi: 这个 愿望 终于 实现 了 ！
pinyin: Zhège yuànwàng zhōngyú shíxiàn le!
english: This dream has finally come true!

hanzi: 我们 找 了 两 个 多 小时 ，终于 找到 了 那 家 店 。
pinyin: Wǒmen zhǎo le liǎng gè duō xiǎoshí, zhōngyú zhǎodào le nà jiā diàn.
english: We'd been looking for more than two hours, and we finally found that shop.

hanzi: 这些 问题 终于 解决 了 。我们 应该 庆祝 一下 。
pinyin: Zhèxiē wèntí zhōngyú jiějué le. Wǒmen yīnggāi qìngzhù yīxià.
english: The problems are finally solved. We should celebrate!

hanzi: 还是 明天 去 吧 。
pinyin: Háishì míngtiān qù ba.
english: We'd better go tomorrow.

hanzi: 还是 让 她 进来 吧 。
pinyin: Háishì ràng tā jìnlái ba.
english: We'd better let her come in.

hanzi: 你 还是 快点 走 吧 。
pinyin: Nǐ háishì kuài diǎn zǒu ba.
english: You'd better leave now.

hanzi: 我们 还是 帮帮 他 吧 。
pinyin: Wǒmen  háishì bāngbang tā ba.
english: We'd better help him.

hanzi: 太 晚 了 ，还是 先 回家 吧 。
pinyin: Tài wǎn le, háishì xiān huíjiā ba.
english: It's too late. We'd better go home now.

hanzi: 这里 太 脏 了，我们 还是 走 吧 。
pinyin: Zhèlǐ tài zāng le, wǒmen háishì zǒu ba.
english: It's too dirty here; we'd better leave.

hanzi: 快 迟到 了 ，我们 还是 打车 吧 。
pinyin: Kuài chídào le, wǒmen háishì dǎchē ba.
english: We're running late. Let's take a taxi.

hanzi: 太 贵 了 ，还是 别 买 了 。
pinyin: Tài guì le, háishì bié mǎi le.
english: It's too expensive. You'd better not buy it.

hanzi: 她 不 想 说 ，还是 不要 再 问 了 。
pinyin: Tā bù xiǎng shuō, háishì bùyào zài wèn le.
english: She doesn't want to say. We'd better not ask again.

hanzi: 他 一定 不 同意 ，还是 别 跟 他 说 了 。
pinyin: Tā yīdìng bù tóngyì, háishì bié gēn tā shuō le.
english: He will definitely not agree to it. We'd better not say anything to him.

hanzi: 你 最好 先 休息 一下 。
pinyin: Nǐ zuìhǎo xiān xiūxi yīxià.
english: You'd better get some rest first.

hanzi: 你们 最好 给 他 打 个 电话 问 一下 。
pinyin: Nǐmen zuìhǎo gěi tā dǎ gè diànhuà wèn yīxià.
english: It would be best for you to give him a call and ask.

hanzi: 那个 地方 不 好 找 ，我们 最好 查 一下 百度 地图 。
pinyin: Nàge dìfang bù hǎo zhǎo, wǒmen zuìhǎo chá yīxià Bǎidù dìtú.
english: It's not easy to find that place. We'd better search for it on Baidu Maps.

hanzi: 外面 挺 冷 的，最好 多 穿 点 。
pinyin: Wàimiàn tǐng lěng de, zuìhǎo duō chuān diǎn.
english: It's pretty cold outside. Best to wear some more layers.

hanzi: 这个 活动 很 重要，我们 最好 穿 得 正式 一点 。
pinyin: Zhège huódòng hěn zhòngyào, wǒmen zuìhǎo chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn.
english: This is an important event. We'd better wear something more formal.

hanzi: 最好 别 去 。
pinyin: Zuìhǎo bié qù.
english: You'd better not go.

hanzi: 最好 不要 这样 说 。
pinyin: Zuìhǎo bùyào zhèyàng shuō.
english: It's best not to say something like this.

hanzi: 晚饭 最好 不要 吃 那么 多 。
pinyin: Wǎnfàn zuìhǎo bùyào chī nàme duō.
english: It's best not to eat so much for dinner.

hanzi: 雨 这么 大 ，最好 别 出门 。
pinyin: Yǔ zhème dà, zuìhǎo bié chūmén.
english: It's raining so heavily. It's best not to leave the house.

hanzi: 这个 问题 是 隐私 的，最好 不要 问 。
pinyin: Zhège wèntí shì yǐnsī de,  zuìhǎo bùyào wèn.
english: This question is private. You'd better not ask.

hanzi: 这样 做 不 对 。
pinyin: Zhèyàng zuò bù duì.
english: Doing it this way is not right.

hanzi: 这样 说 不 礼貌 。
pinyin: Zhèyàng shuō bù lǐmào.
english: It's not polite to say this.

hanzi: 这样 走 过去 更 近 。
pinyin: Zhèyàng zǒu guòqù gèng jìn.
english: If you walk over this way, it's closer.

hanzi: 你们 真的 是 这样 想 的 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen zhēnde shì zhèyàng xiǎng de ma?
english: Do you guys really think so?

hanzi: 你 要 多 鼓励 学生 ，这样 他们 会 更 有 自信 。
pinyin: Nǐ yào duō gǔlì xuéshēng, zhèyàng tāmen huì gèng yǒu zìxìn.
english: You need to encourage your students more. This will help them become more confident.

hanzi: 父母 应该 多 陪 孩子 ，这样 孩子 会 更 快乐 。
pinyin: Fùmǔ yīnggāi duō péi háizi, zhèyàng háizi huì gèng kuàilè.
english: Parents should spend more time with their children. This will make the children happier.

hanzi: 你 要 多 说 ，这样 才 能 越来越 流利 。
pinyin: Nǐ yào duō shuō, zhèyàng cái néng yuèláiyuè liúlì.
english: You need to speak more. Only in this way will you become more and more fluent.

hanzi: 让 他 自己 来 ，这样 他 才 能 学会 。
pinyin: Ràng tā zìjǐ lái, zhèyàng tā cái néng xuéhuì.
english: Let him do it by himself. This is the only way he will learn.

hanzi: 这样 的话 ，你 还 想 去 吗 ？
pinyin: Zhèyàng de huà, nǐ hái xiǎng qù ma?
english: If this is the case, do you still want to go?

hanzi: 如果 是 这样 的话 ，麻烦 就 大 了 。
pinyin: Rúguǒ shì zhèyàng dehuà, máfan jiù dà le.
english: If this is the case, we're in for a heap of trouble.

hanzi: 我 会 住 在 美国 朋友 的 家里 。这样 的话 ，我 家人 就 不 那么 担心 我 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ huì zhù zài Měiguó péngyou de jiā lǐ. Zhèyàng dehuà, wǒ jiārén jiù bù nàme dānxīn wǒ le.
english: I will stay at my American friend's house when I go to visit the US. This way my family won't worry about me so much.

hanzi: 我 昨天 晚上 十一 点 才 到 家 。
pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshang shíyī diǎn cái dào jiā.
english: I didn't arrive at home until eleven o'clock last night.

hanzi: 他 二十 五 岁 才 上 大学 。
pinyin: Tā èrshí-wǔ suì cái shàng dàxué.
english: He didn't go to college until he was 25.

hanzi: 她 四十 岁 才 结婚 。
pinyin: Tā sìshí suì cái jiéhūn.
english: She didn't get married until she was forty.

hanzi: 我 女儿 昨天 十二 点 才 睡觉 ，作业 太 多 了 。
pinyin: Wǒ nǚ'ér zuótiān shí'èr diǎn cái shuìjiào, zuòyè tài duō le.
english: My daughter didn't go to bed until 12 o'clock yesterday. Too much homework.

hanzi: 你 九 点 上班 ，八 点 半 才 起床 ？
pinyin: Nǐ jiǔ diǎn shàngbān, bā diǎn bàn cái qǐchuáng?
english: You start work at nine o'clock, but don't get up until 8:30?

hanzi: 飞机 刚刚 才 起飞 ，晚点 了 两 个 小时 。
pinyin: Fēijī gānggāng cái qǐfēi, wǎndiǎn le liǎng gè xiǎoshí.
english: The airplane just took off. It was delayed for two hours.

hanzi: 电影 七 点 半 开始 ，可是 因为 堵车 ，我们 八 点 才 到 。
pinyin: Diànyǐng qī diǎn bàn kāishǐ, kěshì yīnwèi dǔchē, wǒmen bā diǎn cái dào.
english: The movie began at 7:30, but we didn't arrive until eight because of traffic.

hanzi: 你 怎么 才 吃 晚饭 ？已经 十 点 了 。
pinyin: Nǐ zěnme cái chī wǎnfàn? Yǐjīng shí diǎn le.
english: How come you are eating dinner now? It's 10 pm.

hanzi: 你 怎么 才 来 ？我们 等 了 半 个 多 小时 。
pinyin: Nǐ zěnme cái lái? Wǒmen děng le bàn gè duō xiǎoshí.
english: How come you came here so late? We've waited for more than half an hour.

hanzi: 别 吵 ，一 个 一 个 说。
pinyin: Bié chǎo, yī gè yī gè shuō.
english: Don't argue. Speak one by one.

hanzi: 别 着急 ，一 点 一 点 做 。
pinyin: Bié zháojí, yī diǎn yī diǎn zuò.
english: Don't worry, do it little by little.

hanzi: 请 一 个 房间 一 个 房间 检查 。
pinyin: Qǐng yī gè fángjiān yī gè fángjiān jiǎnchá.
english: Please inspect room by room.

hanzi: 别 拿 那么 多 ，一 个 一 个 拿 。
pinyin: Bié ná nàme duō, yī gè yī gè ná.
english: Don't carry so much. Carry them one at a time.

hanzi: 宝宝 一 天 一 天 在 长大 。
pinyin: Bǎobao yī tiān yī tiān zài zhǎngdà.
english: The baby is growing up day by day.

hanzi: 爸爸 妈妈 一 年  一 年 在 变 老 。
pinyin: Bàba māma yī nián yī nián zài biàn lǎo.
english: Year by year, mom and dad are growing old.

hanzi: 我 一 次 一 次 问，他 就是 什么 都 不 说 。
pinyin: Wǒ yī cì yī cì wèn, tā jiùshì shénme dōu bù shuō.
english: I asked him again and again, but he just wouldn't say anything.

hanzi: 我 一 遍 一 遍 地 跟 他 解释，他 还是 不 听 。
pinyin: Wǒ yī biàn yī biàn de gēn tā jiěshì, tā háishì bù tīng.
english: I explained it to him again and again, but he still won't listen.

hanzi: 你 为什么 一 遍 又 一 遍 地 听 这 首 歌 ？
pinyin: Nǐ wèishénme yī biàn yòu yī biàn de tīng zhè shǒu gē?
english: Why do you listen to this song over and over again?

hanzi: 他们 一 次 又 一 次 犯 这 种 小 错误 ，让 经理 很 头疼 。
pinyin: Tāmen yī cì yòu yī cì fàn zhè zhǒng xiǎo cuòwù, ràng jīnglǐ hěn tóuténg.
english: They keep making the same mistake over and over again, and it's giving their manager a headache.

hanzi: 这 件 事 就 我 知道 。
pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì jiù wǒ zhīdào.
english: I'm the only person that knows about this.

hanzi: 我们 都 忘 了 ，就 他 还 记得 。
pinyin: Wǒmen dōu wàng le, jiù tā hái jìde.
english: We all forgot. Only he still remembers it.

hanzi: 大家 都 下班 了 ，就 老板 还 没 走 。
pinyin: Dàjiā dōu xiàbān le, jiù lǎobǎn hái méi zǒu.
english: Everyone finished work and left. Only the boss hasn't left.

hanzi: 其他 的 菜 都 很 好吃，就 这 两 个 菜 有点 咸 。
pinyin: Qítā de cài dōu hěn hǎochī, jiù zhè liǎng gè cài yǒudiǎn xián.
english: The other dishes are great. Just these two dishes are a little salty.

hanzi: 你 觉得 别人 都 是 傻子 吗？就 你 聪明 ？
pinyin: Nǐ juéde biérén dōu shì shǎzi ma? Jiù nǐ cōngming?
english: Do you think everyone else is an idiot? That only you are smart?

hanzi: 我 就 去 过 一 次 。
pinyin: Wǒ jiù qù guo yī cì.
english: I've only been there once.

hanzi: 我 早饭 就 吃 了 一 片 面包。
pinyin: Wǒ zǎofàn jiù chī le yī piàn miànbāo.
english: I only had a piece of bread for breakfast.

hanzi: 你 就 点 了 两 个 菜 ？
pinyin: Nǐ jiù diǎn le liǎng gè cài?
english: You ordered only two dishes?

hanzi: 他 的 事 ，我们 就 知道 一点点 。
pinyin: Tā de shì, wǒmen jiù zhīdào yīdiǎndiǎn.
english: We only know a little about his business.

hanzi: 她 在 我们 公司 就 工作 了 两个 月。
pinyin: Tā zài wǒmen gōngsī jiù gōngzuò le liǎng gè yuè.
english: She has worked at our company for only two months.

hanzi: 这里 就 一 个 厕所 ？
pinyin: Zhèlǐ jiù yī gè cèsuǒ?
english: Does this place only have one bathroom?

hanzi: 你们 家 就 一 个 孩子 吗 ？
pinyin: Nǐmen jiā jiù yī gè háizi ma?
english: Does your family only have one child?

hanzi: 我 就 一 个 哥哥 。
pinyin: Wǒ jiù yī gè gēge.
english: I only have one brother.

hanzi: 他 在 上海 就 一 个 朋友 。
pinyin: Tā zài Shànghǎi jiù yī gè péngyou.
english: He only has one friend in Shanghai.

hanzi: 我们 公司 就 三 个 员工 。
pinyin: Wǒmen gōngsī jiù sān gè yuángōng.
english: There are only three employees in our company.

hanzi: 先 洗 手 再 吃。
pinyin: Xiān xǐ shǒu zài chī.
english: Wash your hands first, and then eat.

hanzi: 我 喜欢 先 洗澡 ，再 睡觉 。
pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan xiān xǐzǎo, zài shuìjiào.
english: I prefer to take a bath first and then go to bed.

hanzi: 请 你 先 买 票 再 进去。
pinyin: Qǐng nǐ xiān mǎi piào zài jìnqù.
english: Please buy a ticket first and then enter.

hanzi: 你 要 先 做 作业 ，再 看 电视。
pinyin: Nǐ yào xiān zuò zuòyè, zài kàn diànshì.
english: You need to do your homework first, and then watch TV.

hanzi: 我 想 先 找 工作 ，再 搬家 。
pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng xiān zhǎo gōngzuò, zài bānjiā.
english: I want to find a job first, and then move.

hanzi: 先 吃饭 再 说 。
pinyin: Xiān chīfàn zài shuō.
english: Let's eat first, then we'll talk.

hanzi: 先 休息 一下 再说 。
pinyin: Xiān xiūxi yīxià zàishuō.
english: Let's rest a little first, then we'll see.

hanzi: 你 先 看 完 再说 。
pinyin: Nǐ xiān kàn wán zàishuō.
english: Finish reading first, and then we'll see.

hanzi: 我 先 问 一下 老板 再说 。
pinyin: Wǒ xiān wèn yīxià lǎobǎn zàishuō.
english: I'm going to ask the boss first before doing anything else.

hanzi: 你们 先 讨论 一下 再说 。
pinyin: Nǐmen xiān tǎolùn yīxià zàishuō.
english: You guys discuss a little first, then we'll figure out what to do next.

hanzi: 今天 早上 我 起床 以后 先 准备 早饭 ，再 叫 孩子们 起床 ，接着 我们 一起 吃早饭 ，然后 我 送 他们 去 学校 。
pinyin: Jīntiān zǎoshang wǒ qǐchuáng yǐhòu xiān zhǔnbèi zǎofàn, zài jiào háizi men qǐchuáng, jiēzhe wǒmen yīqǐ chī zǎofàn, ránhòu wǒ sòng tāmen qù xuéxiào.
english: After I got up this morning, I first prepared breakfast, and then I woke up the kids. Next, we ate breakfast together. After that, I took them to school.

hanzi: 你 怎么 老是 加班 ？
pinyin: Nǐ zěnme lǎoshì jiābān?
english: Why are you always working late?

hanzi: 那个 孩子 老 说 脏话 。
pinyin: Nàge háizi lǎo shuō zānghuà.
english: That kid always says bad words.

hanzi: 你 怎么 老是 不 高兴 ？
pinyin: Nǐ zěnme lǎoshì bù gāoxìng?
english: How are you always unhappy?

hanzi: 你 儿子 上课 的 时候 老是 说话 。
pinyin: Nǐ érzi shàngkè de shíhou lǎoshì shuōhuà.
english: Your son talks all the time in class.

hanzi: 这个 老师 老是 这么 严肃 。
pinyin: Zhège lǎoshī lǎoshì zhème yánsù.
english: This teacher is always so serious.

hanzi: 别 老是 抱怨 。
pinyin: Bié lǎoshì bàoyuàn.
english: Stop complaining all the time.

hanzi: 这个 机器 老是 出 问题 。
pinyin: Zhège jīqì lǎoshì chū wèntí.
english: There is always something wrong with this machine.

hanzi: 他 经常 迟到 ，还 老是 找 借口 。
